story:
El lanzamiento de una nueva idea era una apuesta de todo o nada. ¡Pero ya no lo es!

El lanzamiento de una nueva empresa siempre había sido una apuesta de todo o nada. La vieja fórmula decía: ten una idea, escribe tu Plan de Negocio... y cruza los dedos. Sabes que probablemente sufrirás un revés fatal porque las probabilidades están en tu contra: incluso los estudios más optimistas dicen que más del 75% de la empresas nacientes fracasan.

Nosotros sabemos que es así: Lo hemos experimentado. Nuestro pequeños éxitos y nuestros pequeños fracasos, nos han enseñado que hay que hacerlo de otra manera: Debemos aprender a tener éxito, y si no es posible, debemos averiguarlo rápido y barato.

Para ello creamos E-MOOC. 


                        ¿Nos ayudas a apoyar, de verdad, a los emprendedores?


Un recorrido gratuito, hecho por emprendedores y para emprendedores.


Esto es lo que hacemos en E-MOOC.


E-MOOC es una realidad: un curso con más de 23.142 emprendedores en la primera edición.

  • Un recorrido formativo de 16 semanas, con más de 50 lecciones en vídeo.
  • Una comunidad de emprendedores, mentores e inversores. 
  • Espacios y herramientas para que los emprendedores creen y crezcan.
  • Contenidos específicos, más profundos, para los diferentes modelos.

    Estas son las lecciones generales de E-MOOC:



    El impacto

    Ya estamos enseñado a 23.142 emprendedores de habla hispana a crear una startup de éxito, o, por lo menos, a descartar su idea de modo rápido y barato. Queremos a muchos más emprendedores y que tú nos ayudes a ello.

                                       El mundo será mejor gracias a ti.



    ¿QUIERES AYUDAR A UNA STARTUP A LLEGAR A LA CIMA? 

    ¿QUIERES IMPULSAR A UN EMPRENDEDOR?

    ¡TU IMAGEN SERÁ VISTA POR DECENAS DE MILES DE EMPRENDEDORES!

     
    Si impulsas a un emprendedor, este tendrá acceso a TODOS los contenidos de la plataforma durante las dieciséis semanas. Y te lo deberá a tí. Y te contará sus avances.
    Anúnciate como "IMPULSOR de EMPRENDEDORES" en la plataforma, y deja que decenas de miles de emprendedores te conozcan. Elige al que más te guste.
    ¿Elegirás al que te envié el mejor "tweet"? ¿Elegirás al más innovador de tu sector? ¿Elegirás al mejor de tu ciudad?


               SI ERES EMOOCer, YA NOS CONOCES

    1$ - (menos de un euro).

    Si sigues el curso, si te estamos ayudando y quieres demostrarnos tu gratitud, esta es tu oportunidad de apoyarnos. ¡¡Entendemos tus prioridades y agradecemos tu contribución!!
    Debes guardar todo tu dinero para invertir en tu startup... pero queremos conocer si nos valoras. 
    Puedes demostrar tu agradecimiento, desde 1$ a 1.000.000$
    Nosotros te recompensaremos con un tweet de agradecimiento y lanzando la Segunda Edición de E-MOOC el 25 de marzo.


               ¿IMPULSAR a un EMPRENDEDOR?

    39$ - (Unos 35 euros) IMPULSA-1

    Si quieres impulsar a un emprendedor. ¡¡Házlo!! ¡¡Él estará eternamente agradecido y te lo dirá!! 

    Puedes elegir a uno que conozcas, o al mejor de tu ciudad, o de tu sector. O si lo prefieres, o al que te envíe el mejor mail o un tweet. O deja que te elija él a tí... varias decenas de miles de emprendedores pelearán por tu impulso.

    ¿Eliges a quien impulsar? ¿O prefieres que el emprendedor te elija a tí apareciendo como IMPULSOR?


    390$ - (Unos 350 euros) IMPULSA-10

    Si quieres impulsar a varios emprendedores. ¡¡Házlo!! ¡¡Ellos estarán eternamente agradecidos!! 

    Tú, o tu empresa, apareceréis delante de varias decenas de miles de emprendedores como IMPULSORES-10... Y te dará la oportunidad de conocer talento, nuevas ideas, negocios brillantes a tu alrededor, o alrededor de tu industria.

    ¿Eliges a quien impulsar? ¿Prefieres que el emprendedor te elija a tí?

    ¿Será una oportunidad para conocer talento realmente brillante?


    3.900$ - (Unos 3.500 euros) - IMPULSA-100

    Si quieres apoyar a los emprendedores de tu sector, de tu ciudad, de tu organización, ¡¡Impúlsalos!! Busca entre los mejores de tu ciudad, de tu sector o de tu organización.

    Tu eliges o ellos te eligen a tí. 

    ¿Sabes lo que significa convertirte en la referencia dentro de nuestra plataforma?

    Serás el "ANGEL IMPULSOR" de los emprendedores... serás la referencia de apoyo a los emprendedores de habla hispana. 

    Pero si eso fuera poco:

    Crearemos un grupo privado para tí o para tu organización, y podrás celebrar reuniones presenciales -u online- con ellos. Nosotros las coordinaremos, y te enviaremos informes de evolución de todos "tus" emprendedores.

    ¿Una oportunidad para conocer a los mejores? Quizás la nueva empresa del billón de dólares esté entre ellas...






        Riesgos y desafíos

        Lo hemos hecho una vez y hemos llegado a 23.142 emprendedores. Muchos de ellos ya son empresas de éxito.

        Y vamos a volverlo a hacer.

        Pero... ¿No te gustaría haber ayudado a Mark Zuckerberg en sus inicios? Esta es tu oportunidad.


        Otras formas en las que puedes ayudar

        Si no puedes ayudarnos económicamente,

        • Difunde nuestro mensaje.
        • O simplemente apúntate en:

                                https://www.e-mooc.com    

           

        ¡¡Empezamos el 25 de marzo de 2015!!
story_txt:
El lanzamiento de una nueva idea era una apuesta de todo o nada. ¡Pero ya no lo es!
 


El
lanzamiento de una nueva empresa siempre había sido una apuesta de
todo o nada. La vieja fórmula
decía: ten una idea, escribe tu Plan de Negocio... y cruza los dedos. Sabes que probablemente sufrirás un revés fatal porque las
probabilidades están en tu contra: incluso los estudios más
optimistas dicen que más del 75% de la empresas nacientes fracasan.
Nosotros sabemos que es así: Lo hemos experimentado. Nuestro pequeños éxitos y nuestros pequeños fracasos, nos han enseñado que hay que hacerlo de otra manera: Debemos aprender a tener éxito, y si no es posible, debemos averiguarlo rápido y barato.
Para ello creamos E-MOOC. 


                        ¿Nos ayudas a apoyar, de verdad, a los emprendedores?
   
Un recorrido gratuito, hecho por emprendedores y para emprendedores.


Esto es lo que hacemos en E-MOOC.

E-MOOC es una realidad: un curso con más de 23.142 emprendedores en la primera edición.

Un recorrido formativo de 16 semanas, con más de 50 lecciones en vídeo.

Una comunidad de emprendedores, mentores e inversores. 
Espacios y herramientas para que los emprendedores creen y crezcan.
Contenidos específicos, más profundos, para los diferentes modelos.


Estas son las lecciones generales de E-MOOC:






El impacto
Ya estamos enseñado a 23.142 emprendedores de habla hispana a crear una startup de éxito, o, por lo menos, a descartar su idea de modo rápido y barato. Queremos a muchos más emprendedores y que tú nos ayudes a ello.
                                   El mundo será mejor gracias a ti.








¿QUIERES AYUDAR A UNA STARTUP A LLEGAR A LA CIMA? 




¿QUIERES IMPULSAR A UN EMPRENDEDOR?


¡TU IMAGEN SERÁ VISTA POR DECENAS DE MILES DE EMPRENDEDORES! 
Si impulsas a un emprendedor, este tendrá acceso a TODOS los contenidos de la plataforma durante las dieciséis semanas. Y te lo deberá a tí. Y te contará sus avances.
Anúnciate como "IMPULSOR de EMPRENDEDORES" en la plataforma, y deja que decenas de miles de emprendedores te conozcan. Elige al que más te guste.

¿Elegirás al que te envié el mejor "tweet"? ¿Elegirás al más innovador de tu sector? ¿Elegirás al mejor de tu ciudad?




           SI ERES EMOOCer, YA NOS CONOCES
1$ - (menos de un euro).


Si sigues el curso, si te estamos ayudando y quieres demostrarnos tu gratitud, esta es tu oportunidad de apoyarnos. ¡¡Entendemos tus prioridades y agradecemos tu contribución!!

Debes guardar todo tu dinero para invertir en tu startup... pero queremos conocer si nos valoras. 
Puedes demostrar tu agradecimiento, desde 1$ a 1.000.000$
Nosotros te recompensaremos con un tweet de agradecimiento y lanzando la Segunda Edición de E-MOOC el 25 de marzo.


           ¿IMPULSAR a un EMPRENDEDOR?

39$ - (Unos 35 euros) IMPULSA-1



Si quieres impulsar a un emprendedor. ¡¡Házlo!! ¡¡Él estará eternamente agradecido y te lo dirá!! 
Puedes elegir a uno que conozcas, o al mejor de tu ciudad, o de tu sector. O si lo prefieres, o al que te envíe el mejor mail o un tweet. O deja que te elija él a tí... varias decenas de miles de emprendedores pelearán por tu impulso.
¿Eliges a quien impulsar? ¿O prefieres que el emprendedor te elija a tí apareciendo como IMPULSOR?

390$ - (Unos 350 euros) IMPULSA-10


Si quieres impulsar a varios emprendedores. ¡¡Házlo!! ¡¡Ellos estarán eternamente agradecidos!! 
Tú, o tu empresa, apareceréis delante de varias decenas de miles de emprendedores como IMPULSORES-10... Y te dará la oportunidad de conocer talento, nuevas ideas, negocios brillantes a tu alrededor, o alrededor de tu industria.
¿Eliges a quien impulsar? ¿Prefieres que el emprendedor te elija a tí?

¿Será una oportunidad para conocer talento realmente brillante?



3.900$ - (Unos 3.500 euros) - IMPULSA-100

Si quieres apoyar a los emprendedores de tu sector, de tu ciudad, de tu organización, ¡¡Impúlsalos!! Busca entre los mejores de tu ciudad, de tu sector o de tu organización.
Tu eliges o ellos te eligen a tí. 
¿Sabes lo que significa convertirte en la referencia dentro de nuestra plataforma?
Serás el "ANGEL IMPULSOR" de los emprendedores... serás la referencia de apoyo a los emprendedores de habla hispana. 
Pero si eso fuera poco:
Crearemos un grupo privado para tí o para tu organización, y podrás celebrar reuniones presenciales -u online- con ellos. Nosotros las coordinaremos, y te enviaremos informes de evolución de todos "tus" emprendedores.
¿Una oportunidad para conocer a los mejores? Quizás la nueva empresa del billón de dólares esté entre ellas...













  Riesgos y desafíos  Lo hemos hecho una vez y hemos llegado a 23.142 emprendedores. Muchos de ellos ya son empresas de éxito.
Y vamos a volverlo a hacer.
Pero... ¿No te gustaría haber ayudado a Mark Zuckerberg en sus inicios? Esta es tu oportunidad.

  Otras formas en las que puedes ayudar  Si no puedes ayudarnos económicamente, 
Difunde nuestro mensaje.
O simplemente apúntate en: 
                         https://www.e-mooc.com       ¡¡Empezamos el 25 de marzo de 2015!!

story:
A Facebook post by Sydney
"I have always been a believer that anyone can do anything they desire with enough dedication and passion, but now I'm just not sure. Month's ago I was asked to be a part of the International Scholar Laureate program to travel to Sydney, Australia on delegation of medicine & science where I would learn at the Melbourne Brain Center (My dream - I'm a Neuro major). The trip is over $4k and couldn't afford it without the scholarship. I've saved nearly every penny, am apart of the PTK honor society, kept my GPA high and have a long history of community service work, but because it's based on my dad's income and I cannot afford to live on my own... You tell me how anyone is supposed to achieve their dreams if no one is given the rightful opportunity. And now my dreams are crushed."

Not so fast Sydney!
Best advice I can give is, ask for help, get advice, network, network and network. Groups get it done! And I know this one can too ;)
Let's send Sydney to Sydney.

story:
This Indiegogo Campaign is conceived and supervised by Fondazione Romualdo Del Bianco


                           Life Beyond Tourism: 

            a Philosophy, a Community, a Model.

Life Beyond Tourism is a philosophy based on going beyond the anonymous services and consumption tourism, which is reaching out to the travelling based on values for dialogue among cultures and peace in the world.

The philosophy was conceived by the Romualdo Del Bianco Foundation in Florence. The Foundation’s mission started in 1991, after the Fall of the Berlin Wall, when there was an urgent need in the world for promoting intercultural dialogue among the youth of different countries.
                         Heritage Community

Life Beyond Tourism gave birth to the international online heritage community. Lifebeyondtourism.org is a 10-languages interactive platform where community members can share and exchange the true spirit of their territory. 

 

Points of interest, itineraries, events, magazine, photoblog – Community Members use a variety of tools to showcase their cultural richness. We save what matters to you from ever-growing appetite of the globalization machine eliminating heartlessly cultural diversities.  

HIGH-RANK TESTIMONIALS ON 

LIFE BEYOND TOURISM: TO MAKE YOUR HERITAGE SURVIVE

We have asked a number of high-rank experts in Culture and Heritage fields to give their testimonials and reasons on why it is important to sustain the principles expressed by the Philosophy Life Beyond Tourism and its practical applications.  See below the comments of Amra Hadžimuhamedović, Chair of the Commission to Protect National Monuments, Bosnia & Herzegovina - the first scholarship funded by #crazyforlife will go to the research on Bosnia & Herzegovina territory: 

     

 More on our campaign from Hans Christie Bjønness, Professor, Norwegian University of Science and Technology, Norway: 

      

 More comments by Jan C.K. Anderson, President of the US ICOMOS National Committee, USA:  

     
     Professional opinion from Nana Iashvili, Dean of Faculty of Fine Art, Tbilisi State Academy of Arts, Georgia: 
     

Another opinion on behalf of Olga Tolstikova, Head of International Relations Department, All Russian State Library of Foreign Literature, Russia: 
     

         Best practice: Life Beyond Tourism Model for                              Sustainable Development  

The practical application of the Life Beyond Tourism philosophy led to the launch of the non-profit sustainable development model Life Beyond Tourism. The model is able to generate money through the flows of tourism. When you book your stay in travel destination, you pay a booking fee which normally goes to multinational booking engines. Life Beyond Tourism Model destines this percentage to the support of cultural heritage of each concrete territory.

Life Beyond Tourism is an already operational initiative in Florence with the local services booking portal Vivafirenze.it. Vivafirenze.it operates under the auspices of the UNESCO office  of the Municipality of Florence and currently sustains 4 projects for the benefit of Florentine cultural heritage, in complete transparency and with no additional costs for the client.        

     For each donation you will be heartily thanked by                                 Life Beyond Tourism

         

Depending on the level of involvement and support you choose, you will receive a combination of unique Life Beyond Tourism rewards, all accompanied by our sincere gratitude for joining our Movement. The rewards are described in detail below:      

          

          

          

          

          

        

Watch more high-rank testimonials on the importance of sustaining #crazyforlife campaign - Marc Laenen, Senior Councilor for International Relations, Fondazione Romualdo Del Bianco:  

     


Giuli Alasania, Rector, University of Georgia, Georgia:  

     


Gerardo Sanchez, Dean of the Faculty of Architecture, University of Nariño, Colombia: 

      


French actress and choreograph Ghislaine Avan on Life Beyond Tourism principles: 

      


Expert opinion from Vahan Yeghiazaryan, Advisor of Minister, Ministry of Culture, Armenia:   

      

                                 Stretch goals

Life Beyond Tourism incarnates universal values of peace, intercultural dialogue and the innate necessity of preserving our culture for the future of humanity.

The money raised in this campaign will be used to develop Life Beyond Tourism in its tangible and intangible aspects and continue uniting people all over the globe with the common aim of preserving and sustaining their territories and their cultural expressions.

We need your support: a responsible action of conscious support, as we sustain what matters to you.

RESEARCH LBT: scholarships destined to young people from all over the world, aimed at research on cultural biography of single territories valorizing them in an international context and creating opportunities for youth employment

APP LBT: creation of an application for Heritage Community Life Beyond Tourism in order to render it available at a fingertip reach on mobile devices

WWW.LIFEBEYONDTOURISM.ORG:technological, graphic and design innovation 

APP LIFE BEYOND TOURISM

Mission Life Beyond Tourism to be rendered accessible to a widest mobile audience. APP LBT will become an important instrument of awareness-raising, community engagement and spiritus loci communication. The App LBT will stretch out to thousands of real believers. Believers in their own territories. Believers in life beyond the facades. Believers in our common culture.            

The multiplatform 10 languages App LBT will give space to your territory: your photos, your points of interest, your events, your itineraries and much – all this at your fingertips!     
Other important testimonials from the scientific and academic world - Massimo Lucidi, Economic Journalist, Emotional Designer, Naples, Italy:
     

Hoshino Tsuji, Director, Kyokane, Tokyo, Japan:
     

Emma Mandelli, Director, International Institute Life Beyond Tourism: 
     

George Gugushvili, Rector, Tbilisi State Academy of Arts, Georgia:  
     
Marianna Savrami, Architect, Athens, Greece:
     

Sarah Meredith, Professor, University of Wisconsin – Green Bay, USA: 
    

    Thank you for supporting us! 


This Indiegogo Campaign is conceived and supervised by 
Fondazione Romualdo Del Bianco

story:
Summary
While Resilient Wind works to bring you the wind careers documentary, 100 Metre Sunrise; Wind Warriors, we're running a new, super-fast 10 Day campaign for renewable energy students in Malawi!

Note that 100% of funds raised will be for two things; Student sponsorships, and producing and shipping backer rewards, that's it! This is a non-profit project for Resilient Wind.

Learn more about me at www.resilientwind.wordpress.com

Aspiring wind energy students and young technicians in Africa have recently reached out to Resilient Wind, seeking a sponsor to enroll them in technical courses.  Lets help them out.

This is great timing because a renewable energy revolution may be underway there now, making a huge difference in quality-of-life for potentially millions.  Here's one way we can be a part of that!


Windolo and Wind Beach, by DC Seibold , and Zebra and Windmill, by Mark Davis, Horns of Hope.  The $500 backer's reward, your choice


With the help of our NGO partners, we'll sponsor 10+ students with a keen interest in renewable energy, to attend the certificate courses being offered at Renewable Energy Training Centre, at the Mzuzu University in Malawi.  There are two courses (Solar/Wind Hybrid systems, and industrial Wind Energy Technician). 

Small solar/wind hybrid systems are great for community level power. In industry, a wind power development boom is underway in parts of Africa. This, combined with training and education, means good, sustainable jobs for local people.

This will be delivered as a joint initiative with  Mzuzu University.

What We Need, & What You Get

  • FUNDING: $5,000+ CDN. Total of funds would go to three things: Student sponsorships, and funds for creating and sending backer rewards.
  • Rewards include the beautiful new Resilient Wind t-shirt, striking "wind art" canvas prints, and a West Coast Wind Jeep adventure!  We will also produce a 10 minute video of the students' testimonials, what they hope to accomplish in wind and solar energy, and what it means for their countries.


The Impact

  • Educate and empower 10 young renewable energy technicians in Africa.
  • Build the Resilient Wind brand, to launch more wind energy empowerment projects, both here in North America and abroad.
  • Create a network together to create exciting change, one clean energy crowd-funder at a time!


Risks & Challenges

Risks include partial funds raised; less students will be enrolled to attend courses.

Scheduling or other logistical challenges with project partners (NGOs or University).

If only partial funds are raised, 100% of funds will be used for sponsorships for specific students that are on the campaign team, or have contacted Resilient Wind about participating.


Other Ways You Can Participate

Contributing funds isn't the only way to help!  Share the link to this campaign with friends and networks that may like to know more about it, and help make it happen.

In Sustainability,
Randyn Seibold
Wind Energy Guerrilla Marketer
March 22, 2015

story:
About the Allied Media Conference

Held every summer in Detroit, the conference brings together a vibrant and diverse community of people using media to incite change: filmmakers, radio producers, technologists, youth organizers, writers, entrepreneurs, musicians, dancers, and artists. We define "media" as anything you use to communicate with the world. You are a media-maker!

The AMC features over 250 hands-on workshops, panels, film screenings, Detroit tours, art and music events, strategy sessions, karaoke, bowling, collaborative art and more!

*from www.alliedmedia.org

Radical Librarianship Track

For the VERY first time this year, there will be a track (series of workshops/panels/sessions) that invites participants to go beyond the traditional understanding of the function of libraries. 
 On June 18-21, we will explore the ways that libraries can provide innovative services that facilitate the development of ideas and practices for strong communities.  Participants will develop strategies for effectively organizing information, media resources, and library spaces to be more accessible to their communities.  
The Radical Librarianship track is coordinated by Andrea Perez of Westland Public Library, Katie Dover-Taylor of Westland Public Library and Rachel Thompson of Seraphine Collective.

**This campaign is raising funds on behalf of Allied Media Projects, Inc, a verified nonprofit.**

What We Need 

The coordinators of the Radical Librarianship track need your support in order to make sure all our presenters and panelists can make it to Detroit for the conference! 

Funds will go towards stipends for travel expenses to Detroit, AMC registration fees, and lodging. 

Registration Fee: $150 per person.

Housing: About $45 per person/per night.

Travel expenses will vary.

The Impact

The AMC is a powerful space for creativity, transformation, and collaborative movement-building.  Presenters and participants will return to their communities with new connections and relationships, insights, concrete skills, new resources, and plans for innovative radical library projects.  The deeper our networks grow, the greater our capacity grows to take collective actions to transform our libraries and our communities!

Other Ways You Can Help

We know that not everyone can support the Radical librarianship track financially.  If you still want to help out with our campaign, please share this fundraiser on Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr, your blog, anywhere!  If you share with the buttons on the Indiegogo page it increases out visibility on Indiegogo.  Thanks so much for your help!

Travel expenses will vary.
    The Impact 
The AMC is a powerful space for creativity, transformation, and collaborative movement-building.  Presenters and participants will return to their communities with new connections and relationships, insights, concrete skills, new resources, and plans for innovative radical library projects.  The deeper our networks grow, the greater our capacity grows to take collective actions to transform our libraries and our communities!
Other Ways You Can Help

We know that not everyone can support the Radical librarianship track financially.  If you still want to help out with our campaign, please share this fundraiser on Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr, your blog, anywhere!  If you share with the buttons on the Indiegogo page it increases out visibility on Indiegogo.  Thanks so much for your help!

story:
Invest In the Power of People!

Since 2001, the Family Independence Initiative (FII) has partnered with low-income families to shine a light on the ingenuity and innovation that exists in America’s least-resourced communities. Where others might see a need for charity, we see an opportunity to invest.  And in New Orleans, that opportunity is tremendous! 

A couple of years ago, we were asked by families in New Orleans to bring our work to their city so that their initiative could be recognized and supported. The families with whom we partner are innovative and hard working. They start businesses and create jobs, address community health and wellness, create art and preserve culture, support youth, and strengthen their communities. 

  • Parents started a summer camp for kids to learn about local art and culture, while improving their academic skills. 
  • Chef Dominique Adansi-Bona teaches community members about vegan cooking and raw food preparation.
  • A group of families are creating a community garden and retreat center to promote health and wellness.
  • Baakir Tyehimbe is expanding his business, Black Star Caffe, a cafe, performance venue, and community gathering space.
  • Artisans and entrepreneurs created Oya Market, a co-op where they can sell their crafts.

By contributing to our campaign, you can support homegrown efforts like these. 

We want to raise $50,000 to invest in the entrepreneurial spirit and creativity of New Orleans' families.

Families working hard to to move forward should be able to get flexible capital when they need it. In New Orleans, we've set up a pool of funds that offers families a menu of choices—like zero-interest loans, savings matches, and scholarships—so they can directly access funds to fuel their own initiative. 

We've already seen tremendous progress since we started working with 40 families (about 140 adults and kids) in New Orleans last year:

  • 23% increase in average household income
  • 10% decrease in the use of subsidies
  • 2x the number of homeowners
Raising $50,000 will allow us to support the initiative of even more families. We hope to be working with 150 families by the end of 2015.

Every dollar you contribute will go directly to the families we work with in New Orleans. And in return, you can get some of the great perks that the families have donated to the campaign. 

Please watch our video and learn a bit more about the amazing community your contribution will support. After you make your donation, please help spread the word so our campaign can succeed:

  1. Email the campaign to your family, friends, and colleagues. Personally ask them to contribute.
  2. Spread the word through social media. The campaign’s success depends on getting the word out!

story:
“If a tornado were to hit, I would take my letters from my brother Brandon, letters from my mom, my first pair of shoes that my dad got me.  That‘s all.” -Raven, Santa Maria's Youth program client said in the interview to The Enquirer on November of 2014.  

Raven and her friends live in Lower Price Hill in Greater Cincinnati area.  This is a neighborhood with high poverty rates (48.8% of Lower Price Hill households have a yearly income of less than $15,000).  This is an area with drug problems; children are oftentimes used as drug carriers.  The youth in Lower Price Hill know both the addicts and the dealers.

Regardless, the Lower Price Hill girls hope, the children in Price Hill hope.  Because children hope...

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

We would like to ask you to consider supporting Santa Maria's Youth Program (City of Cincinnati has cut funding of this program: the funding will stop in August of 2015).  Without your help some children will never see anything beyond the limits of Lower Price Hill and simply will not know HOW to dream big.

Please donate, to help Price Hill become a stronger community and have a brighter future.

About Santa Maria Youth Program 

Santa Maria supports the children in the Price Hill community through its Youth Program.  These programs give children hands-on academic assistance through regular contact and tutoring sessions. Each student in our program is included in a weekly life skills/social-emotional skills group. This helps them learn skills such as peaceful conflict resolution, peer resistance, bullying prevention, self-management and goal-directed behavior.  We also work closely with children's families.  Each family involved is also linked to Santa Maria staff, who provides them with referrals to resources to help promote family stability and to address concerns that threaten or hinder the family's well-being. This amazing program is available because of the generous donations we receive. Please donate, to help make the future of Price Hill as bright as possible!

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word about the campaign, share the link through your E-mail, Facebook, Twitter, and other social media outlets. The more people we reach, the greater the chance that these children will have a chance to experience the wonderful programs we offer.

Learn More

To learn more about Santa Maria Community Services and our Youth Development Program, visit our website: https://www.santamaria-cincy.org/programs/educa...

To learn more about life in Price Hill, read " The Girls of Lower Price Hill" published on the Cincinnati Enquirer. http://www.cincinnati.com/story/news/2014/11/15...

story:
FICA MD - 2 Anos no Ritmo da Capoeira Angola - 2 Years in the Rhythm of Capoeira Angola

We are celebrating our 2nd birthday with our 1st conference!  Help us make this event a success.  We plan on bringing Mestre Valmir from Brazil and Roque Bonfim from Brazil by way of Canada.  

We are raising funds to ensure that we can pay fees and transportation for our teachers, secure materials and a space for the event, as well as provide authentic Afro-Brazilian cuisine and a Samba party to all that attend or help fund our event.   

Any additional funds raised will contribute to our non-profit's mission of bringing Afro-Brazilian culture to underserved communities, using arts such as Capoeira Angola and Samba to unite people of all types in Maryland.  

We hope to one day have enough funds to open our own Cultural Community Center in Maryland!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

FICA MD was founded by Livaldi da Cruz in 2013.  Livaldi was born and raised in Massarunduba, in the Lower City of Salvador, Bahia, Brazil. He has been training Capoeira Angola for 27 years and involved in music for 21 years. 

Baba began to practice Capoeira at the age of 10 with GCAP through the Project “Ginga Moleque” with Mestre Valmir and Mestre Poloca sponsored by Uniao E Conscience Negra. At GCAP he trained with Mestre Moraes and Mestre Cobra Mansa. In 2000 Baba entered FICA Bahia as a senior student of Mestre Valmir. 

In 2003 Baba was invited to come from Brazil to Washington DC to be the director of a residency program at Kamit Institute for Magnificent Achievers (KIMA) public charter school. There, using Capoeira and Afro-Brazilian music, he developed a unique program of physical education and music studies for high school and middle school students. At this time Baba also became one of the leaders of FICA DC and founded the Samba Reggae group Samba Trovão. 

In 2013 Baba started his own chapter of FICA in Prince George’s County, Maryland.

*If you can't contribute money to the event, please help us get the word out!

story:
Chi siamo?

Salve a tutti, noi siamo il gruppo di robotica Pyle-1 dell’istituto E. Fermi di Lucca. Siamo un gruppo composto da 13 ragazzi dell’ istituto accomunati dalla passione per la robotica.
Già da molti anni l’Istituto Fermi svolge attività di questo tipo a vario livello, sia con le classi
dell’Istituto tecnico e professionale sia con le classi del liceo delle Scienze Applicate.
Con il nostro gruppo abbiamo partecipato a varie mostre a Lucca e fuori, allestendo stand con i robot da noi ideati. In ogni progetto da noi svolto,abbiamo cercato di dare  il meglio, tornando a scuola molti pomeriggi al di fuori dell’orario scolastico e portandoci anche a
casa il materiale per completare il lavoro non finito a scuola.

Ed è con la stessa serietà e con lo stesso entusiasmo che ci siamo proposti di realizzare questo progetto ambizioso: la costruzione di una stampante 3D.
La realizzazione di questo progetto porterà il nostro lavoro ad un livello successivo.
La stampante, infatti, ci sarà utile per fabbricare parti meccaniche e di design per i nostri robot e darà anche la possibilità al nostro team di aprire una finestra sul nuovo tipo di progettazione e di tecnologie che queste stampanti hanno introdotto.

A cosa serviranno i fondi?

I fondi raccolti da questa campagna saranno rivolti all’acquisto della componentistica della stampante 3D e alla partecipazione a corsi di formazione sulla costruzione della stampante e sull’uso dei software di progettazione tridimensionale. Sia la stampante che i corsi ci sono forniti dal FabLab di Pisa (il progetto completo è consultabile sul nostro sito http://www.roboticafermi.it/?page_id=2 ).
Il kit per il montaggio della stampante ( HackerBot 3D ) ha un costo di circa 1870€ a cui vanno aggiunti i costi delle ore di corso per la costruzione e l’uso della stampante. Le ricompense per le donazioni saranno prodotti stampati con la HackerBot (per un numero limitato di pezzi anche a 13€, quindi affrettatevi!! ) o gadgets della scuola.

Se la campagna non dovesse andare a buon fine i soldi raccolti verranno comunque utilizzati per il potenziamento della robotica ovvero l’acquisto di materiale utile alla costruzione e allo sviluppo dei nostri robot


Cosa è la Hackerbot 3D?

La Hackerbot 3D è una stampante open source dal design modulare dotata di 2/3 estrusori a seconda del materiale di stampa. Ha uno schermo lcd da dove è possibile controllare lo stato di stampa e compiere altre azioni, è in grado di stampare da schede SD. È compatibile con tutti i sistemi operativi. Stampa ABS, PLA, HIPS e nylon. L’ area di stampa varia a seconda del numero di estrusori e dell’utilizzo o meno del piano riscaldato ma l’area massima di stampa è 300x300x250mm senza piano riscaldato e 200x200x250mm con piano riscaldato.


  per maggiori informazioni visitare http://wiki.oshw.it/index.php/HackerBot  e http://opensourcehardware.it/it/hackerbot/61-hackerbot.html

La parola ai nostri docenti

Durante i nostri incontri siamo seguiti da due professori, che ci guidano anche ponendoci in un ottica più industriale e più lavorativa. Riportiamo a seguito una loro introduzione al progetto e alle motivazioni che l’hanno fatto nascere.

“Nel nostro istituto siamo convinti che l’innovazione sia strettamente legata alle attività produttive e che non possa prescindere da una solida formazione tecnologica. Riteniamo importante, nel mondo di oggi, fornire agli alunni un bagaglio di strumenti che facciano capire loro quanto di umanesimo c’è nella tecnologia e quanto è significativo impegnarsi in prima persona per capire, analizzare e imparare a fare, curando fino al minimo dettaglio che garantisca il buon funzionamento di ciò che si è costruito.

Le attività che proponiamo nel presente progetto vogliono essere integrative alle normali attività curricolari. Di solito a scuola si apprende la teoria, le abilità di base, ma non si riesce mai a vedere un prodotto finito. Con la realizzazione di questo progetto ai ragazzi sarà chiesto di studiare la teoria e metterla in pratica fino ad ottenere un prodotto finito.

I ragazzi potranno approfondire la progettazione di apparati complessi, affiancandosi a
progettisti esperti. Per questo riteniamo queste attività pratiche e teoriche costituiscano anche
una significativa esperienza di alternanza scuola lavoro, dal momento che ai ragazzi sarà
richiesto di formare dei gruppi di lavoro con chi abitualmente lavora in aziende e centri di
ricerca.

Si è scelto di focalizzare queste esperienze su settori e tecnologie emergenti: in ambito industriale, la stampa 3D sta rivoluzionando il concetto di produzione, aprendo la possibilità di nuove professioni.

Queste tematiche permettono e necessitano di un innovativo approccio multidisciplinare: ragazzi
si renderanno conto di come per realizzare una stampante 3D siano necessarie conoscenze
diverse materie scolastiche: meccanica, elettronica, informatica e disegno tecnico.
Il successivo utilizzo della stampante permetterà allo studente di approfondire e mettere in
pratica materie artistiche, dal momento che diventerà possibile la realizzazione fisica di modelli
tridimensionali. Il che apre nuovi scenari di apprendimento.

La stampante 3D, consentendo una semplice realizzazione di componenti meccanici, diventeràun’importante strumento laboratoriale per le successive attività di robotica. Anche la robotica educativa ha importantissime implicazioni didattiche. La rete di robotica di cui da tempo il nostro Istituto fa parte si prefigge lo scopo di coinvolgere gli alunni fino dal loro primo ingresso nella scuola materna e lungo tutto il loro percorso scolastico in attività costruzionistiche, così come sono caldeggiate dal Prof. Seymour Papert in modo che la tecnologia non sostituisca certo gli altri stimoli formativi, ma costituisca un invito capire, costruire fare.

Già da molti anni l’Istituto Fermi svolge attività di questo tipo a vario livello, sia con le classi
dell’Istituto tecnico e professionale, che hanno realizzato vari apparati perfettamente
funzionanti, sia con le classi del liceo delle Scienze Applicate, che hanno partecipato a varie
mostre allestendo stand con i robot da essi stessi ideati (presso il museo civico di Rovereto, la
LuBe.C. (Lucca beni culturali), La notte del ricercatore, Pianeta Galileo e Roboticamente).
Ogni volta che agli alunni è stato richiesto di lavorare per l’allestimento di uno stand essi hanno
dato il meglio, tornando a scuola molti pomeriggi al di fuori dell’orario scolastico, portandosi a
casa il materiale per completare il lavoro.
Noi siamo certi che anche la realizzazione di questo progetto eserciterà una funzione maieutica sulle risorse dei nostri alunni spronandoli a dare il massimo e questo ci sembra un grande risultato anche se nutriamo qualche dubbio sulla sua effettiva innovatività.”

I docenti referenti del progetto Robotica

Prof.ssa  Maria Cristina Marchetti
Prof. Nicola Papazafiropulos

Come aiutarci?

Ovviamente contribuendo alla campagna di crowdfunding ma anche seguendoci e supportandoci durante la campagna e nella fase di sviluppo dopo la sua chiusura sui social network (facebook, google+ e twitter) e su youtube. Andate e spargete la voce!!. Seguendoci rimarrete aggiornati sullo sviluppo del progetto, eventi, mostre, progetti futuri e altro ancora.

Le ricompense per chi contribuisce

Se la campagna andrà a buon fine, abbiamo deciso di fare una conferenza di presentazione a scuola dove saranno consegnate le ricompense e sarà illustrata la stampante. Se voi non sarete presenti alla conferenza potrete comunque ricevere la ricompensa tuttavia in quanto scuola non ci possiamo accollare le spese di spedizione delle ricompense e quindi le esse saranno a carico del destinatario.

Per le aziende che fossero interessate a finanziare il nostro progetto abbiamo pensato a una sorta di  sponsorizzazione in quanto con un contributo dai  100€ ai 200€ metteremo sul nostro sito il logo e il link dell’ azienda per un anno. Per chi invece offrirà una cifra superiore ai 200€ il logo verrà messo anche sulle magliette ufficiali del team che indosseremo per le manifestazioni a cui parteciperemo sempre per un anno. Chi fosse interessato ad una di queste ricompense è pregato anche di contattarci (i contatti sono qui sotto e sul nostro sito http://www.roboticafermi.it/ ).

GRAZIE A TUTTI!!

Contatti

e-mail: robotica@istitutofermi.it
sito: http://www.roboticafermi.it/
facebook: https://www.facebook.com/fermipyle1
twitter: https://twitter.com/pyle_1
google+: https://plus.google.com/109072629306810294502/about
youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCcdjRB6Hb4CNEBKpt2AnZBA

si renderanno conto di come per realizzare una stampante 3D siano necessarie
conoscenze
diverse materie scolastiche: meccanica, elettronica, informatica e disegno
tecnico.
Il successivo utilizzo della stampante permetterà allo studente di approfondire
e mettere in
pratica materie artistiche, dal momento che diventerà possibile la
realizzazione fisica di modelli
tridimensionali. Il che apre nuovi scenari di apprendimento.
La stampante 3D,
consentendo una semplice realizzazione di componenti meccanici,
diventeràun’importante strumento laboratoriale per le successive attività di
robotica. Anche la robotica educativa ha importantissime implicazioni
didattiche. La rete di robotica di cui da tempo il nostro Istituto fa
parte si prefigge lo scopo di coinvolgere gli alunni fino dal loro primo
ingresso nella scuola materna e lungo tutto il loro percorso scolastico in
attività costruzionistiche, così come sono caldeggiate dal Prof. Seymour
Papert in modo che la tecnologia non sostituisca certo gli altri stimoli
formativi, ma costituisca un invito capire, costruire fare.
Già da molti anni
l’Istituto Fermi svolge attività di questo tipo a vario livello, sia con le
classi
dell’Istituto tecnico e professionale, che hanno realizzato vari apparati
perfettamente
funzionanti, sia con le classi del liceo delle Scienze Applicate, che hanno
partecipato a varie
mostre allestendo stand con i robot da essi stessi ideati (presso il museo
civico di Rovereto, la
 LuBe.C. (Lucca beni culturali), La notte del ricercatore,
Pianeta Galileo e Roboticamente).
Ogni volta che agli alunni è stato richiesto di lavorare per l’allestimento di
uno stand essi hanno
dato il meglio, tornando a scuola molti pomeriggi al di fuori dell’orario
scolastico, portandosi a
casa il materiale per completare il lavoro.
Noi siamo certi che anche la realizzazione di questo progetto eserciterà una
funzione maieutica sulle risorse dei nostri alunni spronandoli a dare il
massimo e questo ci sembra un grande risultato anche se nutriamo qualche
dubbio sulla sua effettiva innovatività.”
I docenti referenti del progetto Robotica
Prof.ssa  Maria Cristina Marchetti
Prof. Nicola Papazafiropulos
Come aiutarci?
Ovviamente contribuendo alla campagna di crowdfunding ma
anche seguendoci e supportandoci durante la campagna e nella fase di sviluppo
dopo la sua chiusura sui social network (facebook, google+ e twitter) e su
youtube. Andate e spargete la voce!!. Seguendoci rimarrete aggiornati sullo
sviluppo del progetto, eventi, mostre, progetti futuri e altro ancora.
Le ricompense per chi contribuisce
Se la campagna andrà a buon fine, abbiamo deciso di fare una
conferenza di presentazione a scuola dove saranno consegnate le ricompense e
sarà illustrata la stampante. Se voi non sarete presenti alla conferenza
potrete comunque ricevere la ricompensa tuttavia in quanto scuola non ci
possiamo accollare le spese di spedizione delle ricompense e quindi le esse
saranno a carico del destinatario.
Per le aziende che fossero interessate a finanziare il
nostro progetto abbiamo pensato a una sorta di 
sponsorizzazione in quanto con un contributo dai  100€ ai 200€ metteremo sul nostro sito il logo e il link dell’ azienda per un anno. Per chi invece offrirà una cifra superiore ai 200€ il logo verrà messo
anche sulle magliette ufficiali del team che
indosseremo per le manifestazioni a cui parteciperemo sempre per un anno. Chi fosse interessato ad
una di queste ricompense è pregato anche di contattarci (i contatti sono qui
sotto e sul nostro sito http://www.roboticafermi.it/
).
GRAZIE A TUTTI!!
Contatti
e-mail: robotica@istitutofermi.it
sito: http://www.roboticafermi.it/ 
facebook: https://www.facebook.com/fermipyle1
twitter: https://twitter.com/pyle_1
google+: https://plus.google.com/109072629306810294502/about 
youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCcdjRB6Hb4CNEBKpt2AnZBA

story:
Investments for Developing Communities, IDC, is a grassroots non-profit that provides education sponsorships for girls and micro loans to women in developing countries. We partner with stable, international development organizations working for the betterment of their community.

IDC is excited to propose the construction of a safe house for 40 secondary school girls in the Eremit community of Kajiado, Kenya. SILAN, or "girls” in the Maasai language, will offer alternative living quarters to secondary school-age girls vulnerable to the local practices of female genital mutilation, early marriage and pregnancy. 

Eremit community has a population of 5000, one third of whom are girls. It has become increasingly clear that the greatest hurdle to furthering girl’s education is the societal pressure of marriage and ritual. 10 acres of community land has been donated for SILAN by the community elders and we have recently broken ground for this ambitious safe house. 

As part of it sustainable design, SILAN will collect rainwater for indoor use and to water the indigenous fruit and nut-bearing tress recently planted on the surrounding land. Large gutters will feed 2 10,000 litre water tanks with rain water. Each water tank costs $800. The land is typically arid and the nearest access to water is 1 mile away. The Kenyan rainy season begins in April making it a priority to install the tanks. Long term, giving the girls as well as the trees access to clean water is crucial. Your donation will make this possible: providing water and, most importantly, ensuring these girls an education that offers them tremendous dignity, hope and pride.

IDC has partnered with MANDO for the past three years, successfully establishing a girls education sponsorship program, as well as a micro loan program for women-run businesses within the 3 communities that MANDO serves . We have a proven track record of accomplishing our goals providing 40 women with micro loans and 18 girls with education sponsorships. IDC has raised $15,000 allotted to the construction of SILAN through a matching grant and private donations. We need your support for the water tanks!

For your $25 or more donation we will send you a colorful, handwoven grass mat from one of our micro loan recipients in Uganda. They are indoor/outdoor and great for a picnic or beach mat.

If we do not reach our fundraising goal, the funds received will go toward the construction of SILAN or any of our other programs that you specify. IDC is a volunteer-run non-profit and all proceeds are spent directly on our programs. 

Thank you so much!

story:
Hello..!!

Gaza's children need of clothes and blankets for Warm Winter
Pulse Life Association aim to help all people here in #Gaza. All here in Gaza need your help, and our associatoin want to draw a smile on the faces of people here. Actually the situation is very bad here, and many families live a miserable life.

We are in Winter . just imagine how these families will spend the winter without houses to live in ?, without clothes and blankets? !!. #Children here need your help you can make a difference and draw a smile on their faces. We need your donation, and to be with us and be a part of this blessed work. We want to help children to have warm winter's nights.

Many families are waiting for your help with a lot of hope.
Please consider them part of your family and feel their pain.
donate with any amount and lets bring them smile back. you can be a source of happiness for children in #Gaza.

Donate to help them to have warm blankets.
Please chip in whenever you can!!

#share & #donate

story:
Today, I decided to share my knowledge through an upcoming "cookbook" that will outline everything I learned in the past 10+ years by building and optimizing lead generation campaigns - including the most competitive niche markets such as law and finance.

20% of proceeds will be donated to "American Civil Liberties Union"

story: L'accès au financement est pour un ménage, ce que le sang est pour le corps. Quand il n'y a pas de sang, on s'assèche et puis on meurt. Pourtant en Afrique 400 millions d'adultes n'ont pas accès au financement formel. A titre d'exemple, le taux de bancarisation de l'UE et des USA sont autour de 90%. Au Cameroun, moins de 20% de la population y a accès. Ceci signifie que dans mon pays, prêt de 17 millions de personnes n'ont aucun contrôle sur l'amélioration de leur conditions de vie. Pourquoi? Je suis Dombou Dany, jeune doctorant en économie. Je ne vais pas me mettre à vous citer les articles, mais sachez que de nombreux auteurs qui se sont penchés sur la question (pour ne pas dire tous), ont démontré qu'il existe un lien étroit et positif entre l'accès au financement et la réduction de la pauvreté. Comprenez donc combien il est important d'aider les populations pauvres à être autonomes. Le gouvernement, dans toute sa bonne volonté, élabore des politiques qui des fois réussissent, des fois pas: Mais le fait est qu'en 2017, une bonne partie de la population vie en dessous du seuil de pauvreté. Nous avons dessine un projet qui se présente en deux étapes: Former les jeunes aux techniques de collecte de donnée (ceci durant la campagne de collecte de données pour mon projet de recherche sur toute l'étendu du pays), et puis les mettre en relation via une plateforme physique et virtuelle: Survey & Stat Lab. Mon projet de recherche vise à Identifier les segments de population particulièrement vulnérables à l'exclusion financière, comprendre les racines de leur exclusion, et Recenser à la source leurs propositions pour l'amélioration de leurs conditions. Région par région, sur toute l'étendu du territoire. C'est là que moi, et comme je vous le montrerai bientôt, des milliers de jeunes étudiants chercheurs ont besoin de votre aide. Nos universités n'ont pas assez de moyens. Du coup, nous avons d'énormes difficultés durant nos travaux de recherche. D'ailleurs, ici, pour ne pas dire que c'est la coutume, il arrive parfois que des étudiants passent plus de 7 ans en cycle doctorat sans pour autant soutenir. le master qui se fait en 2 ans, ici, la moyenne c'est trois ou 4. Bien sur il y a d'autres causes à cette situation comme la sorcellerie (blague)... Mais soyons sérieux, la difficulté dans l'accès aux données, retardent et parfois biaisent nos résultats. On donne au gouvernement de mauvais résultats, ce qui entraînent de mauvaise politiques ... Dans une première étape, notre projet consistera durant ma campagne de collecte de données sur l'inclusion financière, à former des jeunes dans toutes les régions de mon pays à la collecte de données. Par la suite, nous lancerons une structure qui mettra en relation tous ces jeunes formés à la collecte avec les étudiants chercheurs. Moi par exemple, pour réaliser mon projet, les plateformes demandent des financements de l'ordre de 100 000 USD, avec ce système, pour le même travail, il me faudra débourser 200 USD. Vous vous rendez compte? Nous formerons donc des étudiants à travailler sur les enquêtes des autres et utiliser une partie de leur salaire pour financer leur enquête à eux. Un pays ne peu pas se développer si sa jeunesse n'a pas accès à une éducation de qualité, si sa jeunesse ne met pas à profit ce savoir au service du développement. Nos frères découragés se noie à vouloir traverser la méditerranée. Nous autres qui avons encore des bribes d'espoir savons que Notre gouvernement ne peut pas tout faire, et nous jeunes, nous avons la volonté de l'aider à nous aider. Nous voulons, mais nous ne pouvons pas: alors, nous comptons sur vous!

Notre gouvernement ne peut pas tout faire, et nous jeunes, nous avons la volonté de l'aider à nous aider. 
Nous voulons, mais nous ne pouvons pas: alors, nous comptons sur vous!

story:
There are over 2 million homeless children in the Philippines alone, and we are about to change that. But we need your help!

Since the Typhoon Haiyan in 2013 the Philippines have suffered unimaginable consequences to their infrastructure, and it took a few optimists to see a way forward.

By building walls and buildings and teaching children around the City of Davao a enormous contribution was added to the slow progress of the countries rehabilitation, but this is not enough!

In a unique collaboration between Filipino and German visionaries the Davao Youth Village aims at changing children´s lives by building a stable, forward-thinking, and sustainable boarding school for orphans.

By harnessing the collective energy of hundreds of volunteers these children will learn to build and create, but also to read, write, and pursue any of their academic dreams so that one day they too can help their fellows.

(Deutsch Übersetzung weiter unten)

(Versione italian giu)

Over 8,000 people

have died either in the Typhoon Haiyan or its followers in the past 3 years. The results are disastrous, and families torn apart are a mere reality in the current circumstances.

Thousands of children remain hopeless and impoverished in one of the worlds most hopeful developing countries, but with populations high and constant Natural disasters it is a job that requires a helping hand.

Crime, Rape, Drugs.

(source: www.rappler.com)

Daily occurrences in the country´s biggest cities, with rates increasing alarmingly after each natural disaster. One of the world´s most beautiful countries is fighting to regain control, and with numbers sinking the ones that still suffer the most are the children left orphaned.

It may seem tough, but we have a plan...

How to save a country, one step at a time:

The Davao Youth Village allows children to flourish in a positive and sustainable environment, together with teachers and volunteers from around the area and the World this safe haven allows the people to regain the initiative, by funding education, and improving socio-economic conditions. One simple step at a time:


Step 1:  Establish basic infrastructures, buildings, housings, fences, water, electricity and teaching facilities.

Step 2: Build partnerships with teachers and mentors, form parents to the youth.

Step 3: Provide teaching facilities, books, equipment and begin the process!

Step 4: Watch as the initiative spreads; the children become the teachers


Education is power!

Power to take matters into your own hands. With each educated orphan a bright young mind is filled with the necessary tools to save the next. With one child educated, ten will benefit!


About Interhelp:





„Interhelp has proven that a trustworthy organisation is possible through personal contacts, and, moreover, when it is officially supported by the Federal Republic of Germany.“

Undine Kurth MdB, report for the committee for economic cooperation and development


„You have shown that international contacts are not only governmental matters but also represent a safety net, able to catch (people) in times of emergency.
The humanitarian involvement of Interhelp members is not only an expression of good and successful citizen´s commitment, but also proof that selfless assistance from Lower Saxony is being given to victims of catastrophe, sustainably and independently of headlines.“” 

Christian Wulff, Former President of the Federal Republic of Germany


„What Interhelp does makes sense! its respectable, sustainable and effective.““

Hans-Heinrich Sander, Lower Saxon Minister for the Environment


“They deserve our praise and respect. Interhelp´s activities cannot be appreciated enough, and we can be proud of the fact that there are people in our town who are not indifferent to the events and catastrophes happening around us, which we must face together.“

Susanne Lippmann, Lady Mayoress of the City of Hameln


„I very much enjoy traveling around as a beggar on behalf of this organisation.“

Prince Alexander of Schaumburg-Lippe, Patron of Interhelp




Interhelp - the German Society for International Aid is a non-profit, charitable and independent aid organisation. Paving the way in forward-thinking initiatives it supports people in emergency situations worldwide, particularly in the wake of grave natural catastrophes, such as earthquakes and floods.

The members of Interhelp work on a voluntary basis. In order to help rapidly, effectively and sustainably, Interhelp is entirely dependent on donations nationwide and abroad.

Contracted by the State of Lower Saxony (Federal Republic of Germany), its Medical Task Force is in a position to provide medical assistance anywhere in the world within 24 hours.

After the tsunami catastrophe in Southern Asia, Interhelp was the first foreign aid organisation with official permission to commence re-construction work on Sri Lanka, this has established a long lasting and significant relationship that remains to-date.

The patron of Interhelp is Prince Alexander of Schaumburg-Lippe.


Run for (your) life

On June 9th, 2016 former Interhelp patron and Bulgari brand ambassador Princess Lilly zu Sayn-Wittgenstein-Berleburg and her son Prince Donatus zu Schaumburg-Lippe will embark on a unique journey.

(Photo: Paul Schirnhofer)

With the sponsoring of both Interhelp and Bulgari their project takes them to the emotional roots of Lilly´s early days with the organisation in Bulgaria, where they will conduct a near 200 km ultra marathon over a course of 6 days.

(Photo: Paul Schirnhofer)

The project symbolizes the hope involved in the charity, whether it is the hope to survive the run, or the hope for a brighter future in the worlds most impoverished countries, in this case the EU´s most economically instable nation.

To this day Interhelp aids orphans throughout the country and contributes significantly to large-scaled relief projects.

(Photo: Paul Schirnhofer)

Both will be updating their instagram daily, and you can follow Lilly and Donatus live on Runtastic to cheer them on! :

Instagram:

lillywittgenstein (https://www.instagram.com/lillywittgenstein/)

donschaumbu (https://www.instagram.com/donschaumbu/)

Runtastic:

https://www.runtastic.com/de/benutzer/lilly-wittgenstein

https://www.runtastic.com/de/benutzer/donatus-s...

Be a part of the fight against poverty

Every day children are dying in the Philippines due to criminal violence and poverty, you can stop that by helping us fulfill our plan. Donations and promotions allow us to help these children actively, and it is all within the click of a button.

Imagine a world where you give the power to help one another through a simple action.

6 ways you can help:

  1. Donate and win awesome perks! -  Any donation helps and goes into the project, nothing is used otherwise. By donating you allow us to build the necessary infrastructures and receive the necessary equipment to do so, and you can win some fantastic perks on the side!
  2. Share and win!– Win an exclusive one on one dinner with Interhelp´s Patron Alexander Prince of Schaumburg-Lippe and his son Donatus Prince of Schaumburg-Lippe, alongside two free entry tickets to one of Europe´s most extraordinary christmas markets
  3. Become an ambassador – Any form of share or help aids the project, one step at a time, but we encourage any Authors or developers to create content that spreads the word!
  4. Show your enthusiasm -  Show that you understand and support our project by following Lilly and Don on their #runforlife challenge by spreading the hashtag!
  5. Give us your feedback -  Helping can also mean to show us how best to spread the word, we love hearing from anyone and greatly appreciate your enthusiasm.
  6. Become a member -  Interhelp is always open for new members, by becoming a member you show your belief in the common cause that is disaster relief and poverty alleviation. Every member of interhelp gives hope for a brighter future. Join now under http://www.interhelp.info/eng_index.php?page=1

or contact us under UBehmann@aol.com 

Your Contribution:

Of course we love to encourage every donation, but in the meantime there are some very limited and exciting perks that await you!

$25 – The „Bellini“ Donation

Show your support for a good cause and receive one of the iconic Interhelp Caps,

worn by both our Patron Alexander Prince of Schaumburg-Lippe and all members of interhelp.

$50 – The „Lana“ Donation

Arguably one of the worlds most beautiful Christmas market, the „Weinachtszauber“ attracts around 100 000 people every year over a course of one week.

Gain free entry to this spectacular show and bring a loved one whilst serving a good cause on the side!

Find out more over http://www.weihnachtszauber-schloss-bueckeburg.de/

$150 – The „Donatus“

Along your contribution you will receive:

  • Two free entry tickets to  the 2016 „Weinachtszauber“

  • A Handwritten letter from Princess Lilly zu Sayn-Wittgenstein-Berleburg and Prince Donatus zu Schaumburg-Lippe

$500 – The „Fürst Alexander“ Donation

The very limited „Fürst Alexander“ Donation gets you one night on Prince Alexander zu Schaumburg-Lippe´s private Historical Island, the Wilhelmstein, in Northern Germany. You will be personally picked up and dropped off at the shore by the Islands caretaker and receive full accommodation for yourself and one other, including breakfast.

$500 – The „Lilly“ Donation

Along your contribution you will receive:

  • Two free entry tickets to the 2016 „Weinachtszauber“

  • A Private Lunch with Prince Alexander zu Schaumburg-Lippe, and his son Prince Donatus zu Schaumburg-Lippe in their Private dining room. The Lunch starts on Sunday the 27th November 2016 at 1 pm, and you are kindly asked to inform us of your participation.

$2000 – The „Behmann“ Donation

Named and Dedicated to Interhelp´s founder and Chairman, Ulrich Behmann, this donation gives you the joy of remaining unforgotten. Your name will be placed on one of the Youth Village´s building to show our appreciation for your significant donation.


Win a very special private Lunch!

Alongside all these packages we are organising a promotional competition. The person that causes the most visits to this page wins a one-time-only special lunch with Prince Alexander zu Schaumburg-Lippe and his son in their private dining room, bespoke to your availability during the 24th November – 4th of December, alongside two free entry tickets to this years christmas market!

In order to win you must simply do the following:

1.  You will need an Indiegogo account to partake, if you do not have one, simply click on this link (https://www.indiegogo.com/accounts/sign_up) , then come back on this page!

2.  At the top of this page you will find the share buttons via social media, use either these or the specific link to spread the word for our campaign! This link only will generate a tally so that we can keep track of how many visits you personally have generated so give it your best!

3.  Every share and every visit brings us a step closer to succeeding in generating our plan, and therewith making this project a possibility for all. 


Questions and Answers

Why do you need $140,000?

After thorough research as to how best we can establish the most sustainable and simultaneously cheap environment for our children we found that this is the basic estimated cost to start building. Basic infrastructural needs such as lavatories, staff quarters, water supply, electricity, but also tools to help us build all of these features come together to generate this sum.

Generally, the future brings more as these are merely the first steps towards building a new home for the Philippine´s orphans, but it sets a foundation that will be the founding boulder of our dream and ambition.

How do we know you will succeed?

Like with all other Interhelp projects, the backed funding of ourselves and our sponsors has given us the backbone necessary to complete all our projects with no exceptions. Praise from members of state throughout both Germany and the countries we have operated in has shown that the fundamental grip and organisation used in our form of tasks is sustainable and effective.

And so, like in any other project, we have worked together with experienced professionals to determine how likely the chances for success are in terms of the Youth village project. Timings, resources and the forms of classes were taken into consideration, so that we can know how likely Jon Perez´ plan is to make an effective change in the local environment. We have come to the conclusion that it is very much possible, and very likely but that we will need a helping hand from a third party, this is where you come in!

It is entirely a matter of if we can, together, raise the required amount to determine the effectiveness of our project. The rest is a matter of the experienced hands of Interhelp and the incredible visionary work ethic found amongst the Filipino Locals.

Where can I donate from?

Absolutely anywhere

Do I have to pay extra shipping fees for my perks?

Not at all.

How can I best endorse you?

Please feel free to see the above! Any authors and/or developers etc. are encouraged to publicise content to link to this campaign, but you can also use simple hashtags such as #runforlife or #interhelp. Any Little helps!

Of course we could not be more thrilled if you decide to go further than this, please feel free to contact Mr. Ulrich Behmann, Chairman of Interhelp under ubehmann@aol.com

How much of the donations go to the project?

Minus the expenses for the perks, Absolutely everything, with no exception.









Deutsche Übersetzung:



In den Philippinen leben mehr als 2 Millionen Kinder ohne Obdach, und wir sind dabei, das zu ändern. Aber wir brauchen Ihre Hilfe!

Seit der Taifun Haiyan im Jahre 2013 die Philippinen heimsuchte, hat die Bevölkerung Unvorstellbares erlitten. Aber eine Handvoll Optimisten hat einen Weg aus dem Elend gesucht.

Durch die Wiederrichtung und Reparatur von Gebäuden und durch die Bereitstellung von Schulunterricht für Kinder in der Nähe der Stadt Davao wurde dort ein wichtiger Beitrag für den allmählichen Wiederaufbau geleistet. Aber das allein reicht nicht aus.

In einer einzigartigen Zusammenarbeit zwischen philippinischen und deutschen Visionären setzt sich das „Davao Youth Village“ dafür ein, das Leben der Kinder zu ändern, indem dort ein stabiles, zukunftsorientiertes und nachhaltiges Internat für Waisen eingerichtet wird.

Durch den gemeinsamen Einsatz hunderter Freiwilliger werden diese Kinder nicht nur lesen und schreiben lernen, sondern es wird ihnen auch die aktive, selbstverantwortliche Mitgestaltung ihres künftigen Lebens ermöglicht. Indem diesen bisher chancenlosen jungen Menschen der Weg zur Bildung geebnet wird, wird es zugleich möglich, dass auch sie eines Tages selbst ihren Mitmenschen helfen können.


Über 8.000 Menschen 


sind entweder durch den Taifun Haiyan oder seine Nachfolger in den letzten 3 Jahren ums Leben gekommen. Familien, die durch die Katastrophe auseinandergerissen wurden, sind unter den gegenwärtigen Umständen eine grausame, aber alltägliche Realität. 

Tausende von Kindern leben hilflos und verarmt in einem der weltweit wirtschaftsstärksten Entwicklungsländer, das aber mit Bevölkerungsexplosion und ständigen Naturkatastrophen zu kämpfen hat, Probleme, die das Land ohne Hilfe von außen nicht bewältigen kann.


Verbrechen, Vergewaltigung, Drogen 


diese und ähnliche Missstände sind in den größten Städten des Landes ohnehin an der Tagesordnung, aber Naturkatastrophen erhöhen die Verbrechensrate noch einmal dramatisch. Eines der weltweit schönsten Länder führt einen verzweifelten Kampf um die innere Sicherheit, und trotz messbarer Erfolge sind es immer noch die verwaisten Kinder, die am meisten leiden.

Die Probleme sind gigantisch, aber wir haben einen Plan...


Schrittweise Hilfe zur Wiederherstellung eines Landes:


Das „Davao Youth Village“ bietet den Kindern eine positive und nachhaltige Umgebung, in der sie gemeinsam mit Lehrern und freiwilligen Helfern aus der Region leben und aufwachsen können. Dieses Refugium ermöglicht es den Kindern, die Kontrolle über ihr Leben zu erlangen, indem Bildung finanziert und die sozio-ökonomischen Bedingungen verbessert werden. Das gelingt durch einfaches, schrittweises Vorgehen.

Schritt 1: Grundlegende Infrastrukturen, Gebäude, Gehäuse, Zäune, Wasser, Strom und Lehreinrichtungen erstellen.

Schritt 2: Aufbau von Partnerschaften mit Lehrern und Mentoren, die als Ersatz für die verlorenen Eltern fungieren.

Schritt 3: Lernmittel, Bücher, Ausrüstung anschaffen, um den Prozess ins Rollen zu bringen!

Schritt 4: Während die Initiative auf immer breitere Basis gestellt wird, entwickeln sich die Kinder allmählich zu Lehrern.


Bildung ist Macht!


Die Macht, Probleme selbst in die Hand zu nehmen. Ein Waisenkind zu unterrichten, bedeutet, einen wachen jungen Geist mit den notwendigen Mitteln versehen, um anderen, weiteren Waisen zu helfen. Von einem unterrichteten Kind profitieren zehn andere!


Über Interhelp:


"Auch die besuchten Projekte "Hilfe für Paraliya" (Schulbau, Unterstützung eines Krankenhauses, Ausrüstung von Fischern), die durch "Interhelp - Deutsche Gesellschaft für internationale Hilfe" durchgeführt werden, haben beeindruckende Erfolge erzielt. Auch hier gilt, dass mittels persönlicher Kontakte eine vertrauensvolle Organisation möglich ist, die zudem von Deutschland aus professionell gefördert wird."

Undine Kurth MdB, Bericht für den Ausschuss für wirtschaftliche Zusammenarbeit und Entwicklung



"Sie haben gezeigt, dass internationale Kontakte nicht nur Regierungssache sind, sondern ein Netz darstellen, das gerade in Notzeiten tragfähig ist."

"Das humanitäre Engagement der Interhelp- Mitglieder ist nicht nur Ausdruck eines guten und erfolgreichen bürgerschaftlichen Engagements, sondern auch Beleg dafür, dass aus Niedersachsen heraus nachhaltig und unabhängig von Schlagzeilen uneigennützige Hilfe für Opfer von Katastrophen geleistet wird."

Christian Wulff, Bundespräsident aD der Bundesrepublik Deutschland



"Was Interhelp macht, hat Hand und Fuß, ist seriös, nachhaltig und effektiv."

Hans-Heinrich Sander, niedersächsischer Minister für Umwelt



"Sie waren als erste vor Ort und sind immer noch da! Das verdient Lob und Anerkennung. Der Einsatz von Interhelp kann gar nicht genug gewürdigt werden. Wir Hamelner können stolz darauf sein, dass es in unserer Stadt Menschen gibt, die nicht gleichgültig gegenüber den Ereignissen und Katastrophen sind, die um uns herum geschehen und denen wir gemeinsam begegnen müssen."

Susanne Lippmann, Oberbürgermeisterin der Stadt Hameln



"Für diese Organisationen bin ich sehr gern als Bettler unterwegs."

Fürst Alexander zu Schaumburg-Lippe, Schirmherr von Interhelp



Interhelp- Deutsche Gesellschaft für internationale Hilfe ist ein gemeinnütziger und mildtätiger Verein, der aus der Aktion „Hameln-Pyrmont hilft!“ hervorgegangen ist. Am 4. Januar 2005, also wenige Tage nach der verheerenden Tsunami-Katastrophe in Süd-Asien, hatte sich die Hilfsaktion in Hameln bei Hannover gegründet. Getragen wurde sie seinerzeit von der Deister- und Weserzeitung in Hameln und vom Paritätischen Wohlfahrtsverband Hameln, der Mitglied ist im Aktionsbündnis "Deutschland hilft". Interhelp ist die Nachfolgeorganisation von „Hameln-Pyrmont hilft!“. Schirmherr der Deutschen Gesellschaft für internationale Hilfe ist Alexander Fürst zu Schaumburg Lippe.

Am 08. Januar 2005 startete von Hameln aus ein Erkundungsteam nach Sri Lanka. Unter der Leitung des Journalisten und Kinder-in-Not-Gründers Ulrich Behmann wurde auf Sri Lanka die Küstenregion des Distrikts Galle erkundet, um nach geeigneten Gebieten für eine Soforthilfe und für eine längerfristig angelegte Hilfe zur Selbsthilfe zu suchen.

In Paraliya bei Hikkaduwa, wo der Express-Zug Nr. 50 von den Gleisen gespült wurde, wo mehr als 2500 Menschen den Tod fanden und ein Dorf ausradiert wurde, wurde die Aktion "Hameln-Pyrmont hilft" vom Katastrophenstab des Divisional Secretariat gebeten, ein Feldlazarett zu errichten. In einem notdürftig hergerichteten Schulgebäude wurden vom 12. Januar 2005 bis zum 15. März 2005 Opfer der Flut behandelt und mit Medikamenten versorgt - unter der Leitung von Reinhold Klostermann, Unternehmer, Lehrrettungsassistent und stellvertretender Vorsitzender der Deutschen Gesellschaft für internationale Hilfe (Interhelp) führte ein internationales Helfer-Team in dieser Zeit 18.500 Behandlungen durch. Kooperationspartner war das Balapitiya Base Hospital.

Mr. Amarasiri Kuruwage, Staatssekretär des Justizministers Amarasiri Dodangoda, bat "Hameln-Pyrmont hilft!" um Zelte und Betten. Flut-Flüchtlinge, die ihre Häuser wieder aufbauen wollten, sollten in der Nähe von Hab und Gut übernachten können. Die medizinische Versorgung wurde im In- und Ausland gelobt und begrüßt - unter anderem von der deutschen Entwicklungshilfeministerin Heidemarie Wieczorek-Zeul, die unsere Projekte besucht hat.

Mit einer Geldspende des Rotary Clubs Bad Pyrmont wurden in den ersten Tagen mehr als 6 Tonnen Reis und Zwiebeln an Rückkehrer verteilt, die die Hamelner Aktion in Sri Lanka gekauft hatte. Überhaupt wurde vor Ort eingekauft. Nur Medikamente, die es auf Sri Lanka nicht zu kaufen gab, und Zelte wurden mit freundlicher Unterstützung der Fluggesellschaft "Emirates" eingeflogen.

Das "Hameln Hospital" wurde am 15. März 2005 an die "Sri Lanka Red Cross Society" übergeben. Somit ist das Rote Kreuz künftig in der Lage bei kleineren Katastrophen selbst einzugreifen.


Run for (your) Life 2016


Am 9. Juni 2016 werden sich die ehemalige Interhelp-Schirmherrin und jetzige Bulgari-Markenbotschafterin Prinzessin Lilly zu Sayn-Wittgenstein-Berleburg und ihr Sohn Erbprinz Donatus zu Schaumburg-Lippe auf eine einzigartige Reise begeben.

Mit der Unterstützung sowohl von Interhelp als auch von Bulgari wird sie ihr Projekt zu den emotionalen Wurzeln von Lillys früheren Jahren mit der Organisation in Bulgarien zurückführen, wo sie über einen Zeitraum von 5 Tagen einen fast 200 km langen Ultra-Marathon bewältigen wollen.

Das Projekt spiegelt die Hoffnung wieder, die dem Wesen der karitativen Organisation zugrunde liegt: Die Hoffnung, die Strecke zu bewältigen symbolisiert zugleich die Hoffnung auf eine bessere Zukunft in den ärmsten Ländern der Welt - in diesem Fall auch in dem wirtschaftlich schwächsten Land der Europäischen Union, Bulgarien.

Bis zum heutigen Tag hilft Interhelp Waisen im ganzen Land und trägt wesentlich zur groß angelegten Hilfsprojekten bei.

Nehmen Sie teil am Kampf gegen die Armut!


Jeden Tag sterben Kinder auf den Philippinen aufgrund von krimineller Gewalt und Armut. Sie können mithelfen, dem ein Ende zu bereiten, indem Sie uns helfen, unseren Plan umzusetzen. Spenden und Promotion-Aktionen ermöglichen es, diesen Kindern aktiv zu helfen, und es ist nur einen Mausklick entfernt!

Stellen Sie sich eine Welt vor, in der Sie Betroffenen die Fähigkeit verleihen können, einander zu helfen.

6 Möglichkeiten, wie Sie helfen können:

1. Spenden sie und gewinnen sie tolle Preise! - Jede Spende hilft und dient ausschließlich dem Projekt, sie wird nirgendwo anders verwendet. Mit Ihrer Spende können wir die Voraussetzung für eine funktionierende Infrastruktur finanzieren - und zugleich winken Ihnen großartige Preise.

2. Teilen und gewinnen - Gewinnen Sie ein exklusives Mittagessen mit dem Interhelp-Schirmherren Fürst Alexander zu Schaumburg-Lippe und seinen Sohn Erbprinz Donatus, außerdem zwei kostenlose Eintrittskarten zu dem renommierten Adventsmarkt “Weihnachtszauber Schloss Bückeburg”.

3. Werden Sie Botschafter - Jede Form von Aktion oder Hilfe unterstützt das Projekt, Schritt für Schritt, und wir laden Autoren oder Entwickler ein, Web-Inhalte zu erstellen, die unsere Botschaft verbreiten können!

4. Zeigen Sie Enthusiasmus - Zeigen Sie, dass sie unser Projekt verstehen und unterstützen sie Lilly und Donatus bei Ihrer Herausforderung, indem Sie den Hashtag #runforlife verbreiten.

5. Geben Sie uns Feedback - Helfen kann auch bedeuten, uns zu zeigen, wie wir unsere Botschaft noch besser kommunizieren können. Wir hören sehr gern von Ihnen und freuen uns über jede Form von moralischer Unterstützung.

6. Werden Sie Mitglied - Interhelp heißt immer und gerne neue Mitglieder willkommen. Durch ihre Mitgliedschaft zeigen sie Ihren Glauben an den gemeinsame Zweck, der Katastrophenhilfe und Armutsbekämpfung. Jedes Mitglied von Interhelp schenkt den Ärmsten der Armen die Chance auf eine bessere Zukunft. Melden Sie sich jetzt unter http://www.interhelp.info/foerdermitgliedschaft_15.pdf an oder kontaktieren Sie uns unter
