Häufig gestellte Fragen


Wofür benötigen Sie $ 140.000,-?

Nach ausführlichen Untersuchungen zur Frage, wie wir die zugleich nachhaltigste und kostengünstigste Umgebung für “unsere” Kinder herstellen können, sind wir zu dem Schluss gekommen, dass dies der Sockelbetrag ist, mit dem wir unser Vorhaben einleiten können. Grundlegende Erfordernisse wie Waschräume und Toiletten, Unterbringung für Mitarbeiter, Wasser- und Stromversorgung, aber auch die nötigen Werkzeuge, um dies alles zu errichten, summieren sich zu 140 000 US-Dollar.

Natürlich werden in Zukunft weitere Mittel benötigt werden, da diese Dinge nur die ersten Schritte darstellen, aber damit schaffen wir die Basis, den Eckstein für die Umsetzung unserer Vision.




IL PROGETTO YOUTH VILLAGE

ISPIRARE UN BAMBINO, ISPIRARE UNA NAZIONE!

Ci sono oltre 2 milioni di bambini senza casa soltanto nelle Filippine, e siamo in procinto di cambiare la situazione. Ma abbiamo bisogno del vostro aiuto!

Dal Typhoon Haiyan nel 2013 le Filippine hanno subito conseguenze inimmaginabili alle loro infrastrutture, e ci sono voluti alcuni ottimisti per trovare una soluzione.

La costruzione di muri ed edifici e la fornitura di istruzione ai bambini nelle vicinanze della città di Davao hanno contribuito enormemente al lento progresso di ricostruzione dei paesi, ma questo non è sufficiente!

In una collaborazione unica tra visionari filippini e tedeschi il Davao Youth Village mira a cambiare le vite dei bambini attraverso la costruzione di un collegio per orfani stabile, progressista e sostenibile.

Grazie agli sforzi congiunti di centinaia di volontari questi bambini impareranno a costruire e creare, ma anche a leggere, scrivere, e perseguire qualunque sogno accademico così che un giorno anche loro potranno aiutare i loro compagni.

Oltre 8.000 persone

sono morte nel Typhoon Haiyan o nei successivi negli ultimi 3 anni . I risultati sono disastrosi, e le famiglie distrutte sono una mera realtà nelle attuali circostanze.

Migliaia di bambini restano senza speranza e poveri in uno dei più promettenti paesi in via di sviluppo al mondo, ma con l’elevata densità demografica/esplosione demografica(?) e le ricorrenti catastrofi naturali è un lavoro che richiede supporto.

Crimine, stupro, droga.

All'ordine del giorno nelle più importanti città del paese, con tassi di aumento allarmanti dopo ogni disastro naturale. Uno dei paesi più belli del mondo sta combattendo per riprendere il controllo, e con i numeri che scendono quelli che soffrono di più sono i bambini rimasti orfani.

Può sembrare difficile, ma abbiamo un piano...

Come salvare un paese, un passo alla volta :

Il Davao Youth Village permette ai bambini di prosperare in un ambiente positivo e sostenibile, insieme agli insegnanti e volontari provenienti da tutto il territorio e dal resto del mondo; questo rifugio sicuro permette alle persone di riprendere l'iniziativa, finanziando l'istruzione, e migliorando le condizioni socio-economiche. Un semplice passo alla volta:

Fase 1: Creare infrastrutture di base, edifici, alloggiamenti, recinzioni, acqua, elettricità e strutture didattiche.

Fase 2: Costruire partnership (partenariati) con insegnanti e mentori, che agiscono come un sostituto per i genitori perduti.

Fase 3: Fornire strutture per l'insegnamento, i libri, attrezzature e dare il via al processo!

Fase 4: Guarda come l'iniziativa si diffonde; i bambini diventano i docenti

L'istruzione è potere!

Potere di prendere in mano la situazione. Con ogni orfano istruito si riempie una giovane mente brillante con gli strumenti necessari per salvare il prossimo. Con un bambino istruito, dieci ne beneficeranno!

A proposito di Interhelp:


"Interhelp ha dimostrato che un’organizzazione affidabile è possibile attraverso i contatti personali, e, per di più, quando è ufficialmente supportata dalla Repubblica Federale di Germania ."

Undine Kurth MP , relazione per la commissione per la cooperazione economica e lo sviluppo

" Avete dimostrato che i contatti internazionali non sono solo questioni governative, ma rappresentano anche una rete di sicurezza, in grado di raccogliere (persone) in situazioni di emergenza .

L’impegno umanitario dei membri Interhelp non è solo l'espressione di un ottimo e riuscito impegno da parte dei cittadini, ma anche la prova che la Bassa Sassonia offra aiuto disinteressato alle vittime di catastrofi, in modo sostenibile e indipendentemente dai titoli""

Christian Wulff , ex Presidente della Repubblica Federale di Germania.

"Quello che fa Interhelp ha senso! E’ rispettabile, sostenibile ed efficace . ""

Hans-Heinrich Sander , Ministro per l'Ambiente della Bassa Sassonia

" Essi meritano la nostra lode e il nostro rispetto. Le attività di Interhelp non possono essere apprezzate abbastanza, e possiamo essere orgogliosi del fatto che ci siano persone nella nostra città che non sono indifferenti agli eventi e catastrofi che accadono intorno a noi, che dobbiamo affrontare insieme . "

Susanne Lippmann , Sindaco del Comune di Hameln

"Mi piace molto viaggiare come un mendicante per conto di questa organizzazione."

Il principe Alexander di Schaumburg-Lippe , Patrono della Interhelp



Interhelp - Società Tedesca per l'aiuto internazionale è un'organizzazione umanitaria non-profit, filantropica e indipendente. Aprendo la strada a iniziative lungimiranti sostiene le popolazioni che si trovano in situazioni di emergenza in tutto il mondo, in particolare a seguito di gravi catastrofi naturali, come terremoti e inondazioni.

I membri della Interhelp lavorano su base volontaria. Al fine di aiutare rapidamente, in modo efficace e sostenibile, Interhelp dipende interamente dalle donazioni a livello nazionale e dall'estero.

Ingaggiato dallo Stato della Bassa Sassonia (Repubblica Federale di Germania), la sua Task Force Medica è in grado di fornire assistenza medica in tutto il mondo entro 24 ore. Dopo la catastrofe dello tsunami in Asia meridionale, Interhelp è stata la prima organizzazione per gli aiuti all’estero con il permesso ufficiale di iniziare i lavori di ri-costruzione dello Sri Lanka, questo ha stabilito un rapporto duraturo e significativo che resta attuale.

Il patrono di Interhelp è il principe Alexander di Schaumburg-Lippe .




Correre per salvarsi la vita

Il 9 giugno 2016 l'ex patrono Interhelp e ambasciatore del marchio Bulgari la Principessa Lilly zu Sayn-Wittgenstein-Berleburg e suo figlio principe Donatus di Schaumburg-Lippe si imbarcheranno in un viaggio unico.

Con il patrocinio di Interhelp e Bulgari il loro progetto li porta alle radici sentimentali dei primi giorni di Lilly con l'organizzazione in Bulgaria , dove condurrano un’ultra maratona di circa 200 km su un percorso di 6 giorni .

Il progetto simboleggia la speranza coinvolta nella beneficenza, sia che si tratti della speranza di sopravvivere alla corsa, o la speranza di un futuro migliore nei paesi più poveri del mondo, in questo caso la nazione economicamente più instabile della UE.

Ad oggi Interhelp aiuta gli orfani in tutto il paese e contribuisce in modo significativo a progetti di soccorso su larga scala.

Prendi parte alla lotta contro la povertà

Ogni giorno i bambini muiono nelle Filippine a causa della violenza criminale e della povertà, potete porre fine a tutto ciò aiutandoci a realizzare il nostro progetto. Le donazioni e le promozioni ci permettono di aiutare attivamente questi bambini, e basta un click per fare tutto questo con.

Immaginate un mondo in cui si dà il potere di aiutarsi l'un l'altro attraverso una semplice azione.


6 modi per aiutare:

  1. Dona e vinci fantastici vantaggi! - Ogni donazione aiuta e finanzia progetto, non viene utilizzata in altro modo. Le donazioni ci consentono di costruire le infrastrutture necessarie e di ricevere le attrezzature necessarie per farlo, e si possono vincere alcuni fantastici vantaggi extra!
  2. Condividi e vinci! - Vincere una cena esclusiva con il patrono Interhelp Alexander Principe di Schaumburg-Lippe e suo figlio Donatus Principe di Schaumburg-Lippe, insieme a due biglietti di ingresso gratuiti per uno dei più straordinari mercatini di Natale in Europa
  3. Diventa un ambasciatore - Ogni forma di condivisione o di aiuto favorisce il progetto, un passo alla volta, ma noi incoraggiamo eventuali autori o sviluppatori a creare contenuti per spargere la voce!
  4. Mostra il tuo entusiasmo - Mostraci che comprendi e sostieni il nostro progetto seguendo Lilly e Don nella loro sfida #runforlife diffondendo l'hashtag!
  5. Dateci il vostro feedback – Potete aiutarci anche mostrandoci il modo migliore per spargere la voce, ci interessa molto la vostra opinione e apprezziamo molto il vostro entusiasmo.
  6. Diventa un membro - Interhelp è sempre aperta a nuovi membri, diventando un membro dimostri la tua fede nella causa comune che sono i soccorsi in caso di catastofi e riduzione della povertà. Ogni membro di interhelp aiuto dà speranza per un futuro più luminoso. Registrati ora all’indirizzo http://www.interhelp.info/eng_index.php?page=1

o contattaci al UBehmann@aol.com

Il vostro contributo:

Naturalmente incoraggiamo ogni donazione, ma allo stesso tempo ci sono alcuni emozionanti vantaggi molto limitati che vi aspettano!

$ 25 - La donazione "Bellini"

Mostrate il vostro sostegno per una buona causa e riceverete una degli iconici Caps Interhelp, indossato dal nostro patrono Alexander Principe di Schaumburg-Lippe e da tutti i membri Interhelp.

$ 50 - La donazione "Lana"

Probabilmente uno dei mercatini di Natale più belli al mondo, la "magia di Natale"attrae circa 100 000 persone ogni anno nel corso di una settimana.

Ottieni l'ingresso gratuito a questo magnifico evento e porta una persona cara, sostenendo nello stesso tempo una buona causa!

Per saperne di più vai su http://www.weihnachtszauber-schloss-bueckeburg.de/

$ 150 - La "Donatus"

Con il vostro contributo riceverete:

·  Due biglietti d'ingresso gratuiti per "Magico Natale" 2016

·  Una lettera scritta a mano dalla Principessa Lilly zu Sayn-Wittgenstein-Berleburg e dal Principe Donato di Schaumburg-Lippe

$ 500 - La Donazione "principe Alexander"

La donazione molto limitata "Principe Alexander" offre una notte sulla storica isola privata del PrincipeAlexander Schaumburg-Lippe, la Wilhelmstein, nella Germania del Nord. Sarete prelevati personalmente e lasciati a riva dal custode dell’isola e avrete diritto ad una pensione completa per voi e un’altra persona, compresa la prima colazione.

$ 500 – La Donazione "Lilly"

Con il vostro contributo riceverete:

·  Due biglietti d'ingresso gratuiti per il "Magico Natale" 2016

·  Un pranzo privato con il principe Alexander Schaumburg-Lippe, e suo figlio il principe Donato di Schaumburg-Lippe nella loro sala da pranzo privata. Il pranzo inizia Domenica 27 novembre 2016 alle 13:00, e siete gentilmente pregati di informarci della vostra partecipazione.

$ 2000 - La donazione "Behmann"

Dedicata al fondatore e Presidente di Interhelp di cui porta il nome, Ulrich Behmann , questa donazione ti dà la gioia di rimanere indimenticato. Il tuo nome verrà posto su una delle costruzioni del Youth Village per mostrare il nostro apprezzamento per la tua significativa donazione.

Vinci un pranzo privato molto speciale!

Accanto a tutti i pacchetti stiamo organizzando un concorso promozionale. La persona che procura più visite a questa pagina vince un pranzo speciale unico con il con il principe Alexander Schaumburg-Lippe e suo figlio nella loro sala da pranzo privata, su misura della vostra disponibilità nel periodo 24 novembre - 4 dicembre, insieme a due biglietti di ingresso gratuiti per il Mercatino di Natale di quest’anno!

Per vincere dovete semplicemente effettuare le seguenti operazioni (fare quanto segue):

1. È necessario un account Indiegogo per partecipare, se non ne avete uno, è sufficiente fare clic su questo link ( https://www.indiegogo.com/accounts/sign_up), per poi tornare su questa pagina!

2. Nella parte superiore di questa pagina troveretei pulsanti per la condivisione attraverso i social media, utilizzare questi o il link specifico per spargere la notizia per la nostra campagna! Solo questo link genererà un conteggio così che possiamo tenere traccia di quante visite hai generato personalmente, perciò fai del tuo meglio!

3. Ogni condivisione ed ogni visita ci avvicina a riuscire a generare il nostro piano, e a fare di questo progetto una possibilità per tutti. 



Domande e risposte

Perché avete bisogno di $ 140.000?

Dopo una ricerca approfondita su come meglio possiamo stabilire il contesto più sostenibile ed allo stesso tempo più economico per i nostri bambini abbiamo definito che questo è il costo di base stimato per iniziare a costruire. Le esigenze infrastrutturali di base, quali servizi igienici, alloggi del personale, fornitura di acqua, energia elettrica, si sommano agli strumenti necessari per costruire tutto questo, generando tale importo.

Naturalmente in futuro saranno necessari più fondi, poichè questi sono soli i primi passi verso la costruzione di una nuova casa per gli orfani delle Filippine, ma getta le fondamente che saranno la pietra angolare per realizzare il nostro sogno e la nostra ambizione.

Come facciamo a sapere che avrà successo?

Come con tutti gli altri progetti Interhelp, il finanziamento sostenuto da noi e dai nostri sponsor ci ha dato determinazione necessaria per completare tutti i nostri progetti senza eccezioni. Lodi da parte dei membri dello stato ovunque sia in Germania che nei paesi in cui abbiamo operato hanno dimostrato che la fondamentale padronanza e organizzazione utilizzate nella nostra struttura dei compiti è sostenibile ed efficace.

E così, come per qualsiasi altro progetto, abbiamo lavorato insieme con professionisti esperti per determinare le probabilità di successo del progetto Youth Village. Le tempistiche, le risorse e il tipo di corsi sono stati presi in considerazione, per determinare quante sono le probabilità del progetto di Jon Perez di apportare un cambiamento effettivo al contesto locale. Siamo giunti alla conclusione che è di fatto possibile, e molto probabile, ma che avremmo avuto bisogno di una mano da parte di terzi, qui è dove entri in scena tu!

E' interamente una questione di se possiamo, insieme, raggiungere l'importo necessario per determinare l'efficacia del nostro progetto. Il resto riguarda le mani esperte di Interhelp e l'incredibile etica del lavoro visionario dei Filippini.

Da dove posso donare?

Ovunque.

Devo pagare spese di spedizione supplementari per i miei vantaggi?

Niente affatto.

Qual è il modo migliore per sostenervi?

Non esitate a consultare quanto sopra! Eventuali autori e / o gli sviluppatori, ecc sono invitati a divulgare materiale collegato a questa campagna, ma è possibile utilizzare anche semplici hashtag #runforlife o #interhelp. Qualunque piccolo azione aiuta!

Naturalmente non potremmo essere più emozionati se decideste di fare di più, non esitate a contattare il Sig Ulrich Behmann, Presidente di Interhelp al ubehmann@aol.com

Quanto delle donazioni va al progetto?

Meno le spese per i benefici accessori, tutto quanto , senza alcuna eccezione.
story_txt:
There are over 2 million homeless children in the Philippines alone, and we are about to change that. But we need your help!Since the Typhoon Haiyan in 2013 the Philippines have suffered unimaginable consequences to their infrastructure, and it took a few optimists to see a way forward.By building walls and buildings and teaching children around the City of Davao a enormous contribution was added to the slow progress of the countries rehabilitation, but this is not enough!In a unique collaboration between Filipino and German visionaries the Davao Youth Village aims at changing children´s lives by building a stable, forward-thinking, and sustainable boarding school for orphans.By harnessing the collective energy of hundreds of volunteers these children will learn to build and create, but also to read, write, and pursue any of their academic dreams so that one day they too can help their fellows.(Deutsch Übersetzung weiter unten)(Versione italian giu)Over 8,000 peoplehave died either in the Typhoon Haiyan or its followers in the past 3 years. The results are disastrous, and families torn apart are a mere reality in the current circumstances.Thousands of children remain hopeless and impoverished in one of the worlds most hopeful developing countries, but with populations high and constant Natural disasters it is a job that requires a helping hand.Crime, Rape, Drugs.(source: www.rappler.com)Daily occurrences in the country´s biggest cities, with rates increasing alarmingly after each natural disaster. One of the world´s most beautiful countries is fighting to regain control, and with numbers sinking the ones that still suffer the most are the children left orphaned.It may seem tough, but we have a plan...How to save a country, one step at a time:The Davao Youth Village allows children to flourish in a positive and sustainable environment, together with teachers and volunteers from around the area and the World this safe haven allows the people to regain the initiative, by funding education, and improving socio-economic conditions. One simple step at a time:Step 1:  Establish basic infrastructures, buildings, housings, fences, water, electricity and teaching facilities.Step 2: Build partnerships with teachers and mentors, form parents to the youth.Step 3: Provide teaching facilities, books, equipment and begin the process!Step 4: Watch as the initiative spreads; the children become the teachersEducation is power!Power to take matters into your own hands. With each educated orphan a bright young mind is filled with the necessary tools to save the next. With one child educated, ten will benefit!About Interhelp:„Interhelp has proven that a trustworthy organisation is possible through personal contacts, and, moreover, when it is officially supported by the Federal Republic of Germany.“Undine Kurth MdB, report for the committee for economic cooperation and development„You have shown that international contacts are not only governmental matters but also represent a safety net, able to catch (people) in times of emergency.The humanitarian involvement of Interhelp members is not only an expression of good and successful citizen´s commitment, but also proof that selfless assistance from Lower Saxony is being given to victims of catastrophe, sustainably and independently of headlines.“” Christian Wulff, Former President of the Federal Republic of Germany„What Interhelp does makes sense! its respectable, sustainable and effective.““Hans-Heinrich Sander, Lower Saxon Minister for the Environment“They deserve our praise and respect. Interhelp´s activities cannot be appreciated enough, and we can be proud of the fact that there are people in our town who are not indifferent to the events and catastrophes happening around us, which we must face together.“Susanne Lippmann, Lady Mayoress of the City of Hameln„I very much enjoy traveling around as a beggar on behalf of this organisation.“Prince Alexander of Schaumburg-Lippe, Patron of InterhelpInterhelp - the German Society for International Aid is a non-profit, charitable and independent aid organisation. Paving the way in forward-thinking initiatives it supports people in emergency situations worldwide, particularly in the wake of grave natural catastrophes, such as earthquakes and floods.The members of Interhelp work on a voluntary basis. In order to help rapidly, effectively and sustainably, Interhelp is entirely dependent on donations nationwide and abroad.Contracted by the State of Lower Saxony (Federal Republic of Germany), its Medical Task Force is in a position to provide medical assistance anywhere in the world within 24 hours.After the tsunami catastrophe in Southern Asia, Interhelp was the first foreign aid organisation with official permission to commence re-construction work on Sri Lanka, this has established a long lasting and significant relationship that remains to-date.The patron of Interhelp is Prince Alexander of Schaumburg-Lippe.Run for (your) lifeOn June 9th, 2016 former Interhelp patron and Bulgari brand ambassador Princess Lilly zu Sayn-Wittgenstein-Berleburg and her son Prince Donatus zu Schaumburg-Lippe will embark on a unique journey.(Photo: Paul Schirnhofer)With the sponsoring of both Interhelp and Bulgari their project takes them to the emotional roots of Lilly´s early days with the organisation in Bulgaria, where they will conduct a near 200 km ultra marathon over a course of 6 days.(Photo: Paul Schirnhofer)The project symbolizes the hope involved in the charity, whether it is the hope to survive the run, or the hope for a brighter future in the worlds most impoverished countries, in this case the EU´s most economically instable nation.To this day Interhelp aids orphans throughout the country and contributes significantly to large-scaled relief projects.(Photo: Paul Schirnhofer)Both will be updating their instagram daily, and you can follow Lilly and Donatus live on Runtastic to cheer them on! :Instagram:lillywittgenstein (https://www.instagram.com/lillywittgenstein/)donschaumbu (https://www.instagram.com/donschaumbu/)Runtastic:https://www.runtastic.com/de/benutzer/lilly-wittgensteinhttps://www.runtastic.com/de/benutzer/donatus-s...Be a part of the fight against povertyEvery day children are dying in the Philippines due to criminal violence and poverty, you can stop that by helping us fulfill our plan. Donations and promotions allow us to help these children actively, and it is all within the click of a button.Imagine a world where you give the power to help one another through a simple action.6 ways you can help:

Donate and win awesome perks! -  Any donation helps and goes into the project, nothing is used otherwise. By donating you allow us to build the necessary infrastructures and receive the necessary equipment to do so, and you can win some fantastic perks on the side!

Share and win!– Win an exclusive one on one dinner with Interhelp´s Patron Alexander Prince of Schaumburg-Lippe and his son Donatus Prince of Schaumburg-Lippe, alongside two free entry tickets to one of Europe´s most extraordinary christmas markets

Become an ambassador – Any form of share or help aids the project, one step at a time, but we encourage any Authors or developers to create content that spreads the word!

Show your enthusiasm -  Show that you understand and support our project by following Lilly and Don on their #runforlife challenge by spreading the hashtag!

Give us your feedback -  Helping can also mean to show us how best to spread the word, we love hearing from anyone and greatly appreciate your enthusiasm.

Become a member -  Interhelp is always open for new members, by becoming a member you show your belief in the common cause that is disaster relief and poverty alleviation. Every member of interhelp gives hope for a brighter future. Join now under http://www.interhelp.info/eng_index.php?page=1

or contact us under UBehmann@aol.com Your Contribution:Of course we love to encourage every donation, but in the meantime there are some very limited and exciting perks that await you!$25 – The „Bellini“ DonationShow your support for a good cause and receive one of the iconic Interhelp Caps,worn by both our Patron Alexander Prince of Schaumburg-Lippe and all members of interhelp.$50 – The „Lana“ DonationArguably one of the worlds most beautiful Christmas market, the „Weinachtszauber“ attracts around 100 000 people every year over a course of one week.Gain free entry to this spectacular show and bring a loved one whilst serving a good cause on the side!Find out more over http://www.weihnachtszauber-schloss-bueckeburg.de/$150 – The „Donatus“ Along your contribution you will receive:
Two free entry tickets to  the 2016 „Weinachtszauber“
A Handwritten letter from Princess Lilly zu Sayn-Wittgenstein-Berleburg and Prince Donatus zu Schaumburg-Lippe
$500 – The „Fürst Alexander“ DonationThe very limited „Fürst Alexander“ Donation gets you one night on Prince Alexander zu Schaumburg-Lippe´s private Historical Island, the Wilhelmstein, in Northern Germany. You will be personally picked up and dropped off at the shore by the Islands caretaker and receive full accommodation for yourself and one other, including breakfast.$500 – The „Lilly“ DonationAlong your contribution you will receive:
Two free entry tickets to the 2016 „Weinachtszauber“
A Private Lunch with Prince Alexander zu Schaumburg-Lippe, and his son Prince Donatus zu Schaumburg-Lippe in their Private dining room. The Lunch starts on Sunday the 27th November 2016 at 1 pm, and you are kindly asked to inform us of your participation.
$2000 – The „Behmann“ DonationNamed and Dedicated to Interhelp´s founder and Chairman, Ulrich Behmann, this donation gives you the joy of remaining unforgotten. Your name will be placed on one of the Youth Village´s building to show our appreciation for your significant donation.
Win a very special private Lunch! 
Alongside all these packages we are organising a promotional
competition. The person that causes the most visits to this page wins a
one-time-only special lunch with Prince Alexander zu Schaumburg-Lippe and his
son in their private dining room, bespoke to your availability during the 24th November – 4th of December,
alongside two free entry tickets to this years christmas market! 
In order to win you must simply do the following:
1. 
You will need an Indiegogo account to partake,
if you do not have one, simply click on this link (https://www.indiegogo.com/accounts/sign_up)
, then come back on this page!
2. 
At the top of this page you will find the share
buttons via social media, use either these or the specific link to spread the
word for our campaign! This link only will generate a tally so that we can keep
track of how many visits you
personally have generated so give it your best!
3. 
Every share and every visit brings us a step
closer to succeeding in generating our plan, and therewith making this project
a possibility for all. 
Questions and AnswersWhy do you need $140,000?After thorough research as to how best we can establish the most sustainable and simultaneously cheap environment for our children we found that this is the basic estimated cost to start building. Basic infrastructural needs such as lavatories, staff quarters, water supply, electricity, but also tools to help us build all of these features come together to generate this sum.Generally, the future brings more as these are merely the first steps towards building a new home for the Philippine´s orphans, but it sets a foundation that will be the founding boulder of our dream and ambition.How do we know you will succeed?Like with all other Interhelp projects, the backed funding of ourselves and our sponsors has given us the backbone necessary to complete all our projects with no exceptions. Praise from members of state throughout both Germany and the countries we have operated in has shown that the fundamental grip and organisation used in our form of tasks is sustainable and effective.And so, like in any other project, we have worked together with experienced professionals to determine how likely the chances for success are in terms of the Youth village project. Timings, resources and the forms of classes were taken into consideration, so that we can know how likely Jon Perez´ plan is to make an effective change in the local environment. We have come to the conclusion that it is very much possible, and very likely but that we will need a helping hand from a third party, this is where you come in!It is entirely a matter of if we can, together, raise the required amount to determine the effectiveness of our project. The rest is a matter of the experienced hands of Interhelp and the incredible visionary work ethic found amongst the Filipino Locals.Where can I donate from?Absolutely anywhereDo I have to pay extra shipping fees for my perks?Not at all.How can I best endorse you?Please feel free to see the above! Any authors and/or developers etc. are encouraged to publicise content to link to this campaign, but you can also use simple hashtags such as #runforlife or #interhelp. Any Little helps!Of course we could not be more thrilled if you decide to go further than this, please feel free to contact Mr. Ulrich Behmann, Chairman of Interhelp under ubehmann@aol.comHow much of the donations go to the project?Minus the expenses for the perks, Absolutely everything, with no exception.Deutsche Übersetzung:

In den Philippinen leben mehr als 2 Millionen Kinder ohne Obdach, und wir sind dabei, das zu ändern. Aber wir brauchen Ihre Hilfe!

Seit der Taifun Haiyan im Jahre 2013 die Philippinen heimsuchte, hat die Bevölkerung Unvorstellbares erlitten. Aber eine Handvoll Optimisten hat einen Weg aus dem Elend gesucht.

Durch die Wiederrichtung und Reparatur von Gebäuden und durch die Bereitstellung von Schulunterricht für Kinder in der Nähe der Stadt Davao wurde dort ein wichtiger Beitrag für den allmählichen Wiederaufbau geleistet. Aber das allein reicht nicht aus.

In einer einzigartigen Zusammenarbeit zwischen philippinischen und deutschen Visionären setzt sich das „Davao Youth Village“ dafür ein, das Leben der Kinder zu ändern, indem dort ein stabiles, zukunftsorientiertes und nachhaltiges Internat für Waisen eingerichtet wird.

Durch den gemeinsamen Einsatz hunderter Freiwilliger werden diese Kinder nicht nur lesen und schreiben lernen, sondern es wird ihnen auch die aktive, selbstverantwortliche Mitgestaltung ihres künftigen Lebens ermöglicht. Indem diesen bisher chancenlosen jungen Menschen der Weg zur Bildung geebnet wird, wird es zugleich möglich, dass auch sie eines Tages selbst ihren Mitmenschen helfen können.


Über 8.000 Menschen sind entweder durch den Taifun Haiyan oder seine Nachfolger in den letzten 3 Jahren ums Leben gekommen. Familien, die durch die Katastrophe auseinandergerissen wurden, sind unter den gegenwärtigen Umständen eine grausame, aber alltägliche Realität. 

Tausende von Kindern leben hilflos und verarmt in einem der weltweit wirtschaftsstärksten Entwicklungsländer, das aber mit Bevölkerungsexplosion und ständigen Naturkatastrophen zu kämpfen hat, Probleme, die das Land ohne Hilfe von außen nicht bewältigen kann.

Verbrechen, Vergewaltigung, Drogen diese und ähnliche Missstände sind in den größten Städten des Landes ohnehin an der Tagesordnung, aber Naturkatastrophen erhöhen die Verbrechensrate noch einmal dramatisch. Eines der weltweit schönsten Länder führt einen verzweifelten Kampf um die innere Sicherheit, und trotz messbarer Erfolge sind es immer noch die verwaisten Kinder, die am meisten leiden.

Die Probleme sind gigantisch, aber wir haben einen Plan...

Schrittweise Hilfe zur Wiederherstellung eines Landes:

Das „Davao Youth Village“ bietet den Kindern eine positive und nachhaltige Umgebung, in der sie gemeinsam mit Lehrern und freiwilligen Helfern aus der Region leben und aufwachsen können. Dieses Refugium ermöglicht es den Kindern, die Kontrolle über ihr Leben zu erlangen, indem Bildung finanziert und die sozio-ökonomischen Bedingungen verbessert werden. Das gelingt durch einfaches, schrittweises Vorgehen.

Schritt 1: Grundlegende Infrastrukturen, Gebäude, Gehäuse, Zäune, Wasser, Strom und Lehreinrichtungen erstellen.

Schritt 2: Aufbau von Partnerschaften mit Lehrern und Mentoren, die als Ersatz für die verlorenen Eltern fungieren.

Schritt 3: Lernmittel, Bücher, Ausrüstung anschaffen, um den Prozess ins Rollen zu bringen!

Schritt 4: Während die Initiative auf immer breitere Basis gestellt wird, entwickeln sich die Kinder allmählich zu Lehrern.


Bildung ist Macht!

Die Macht, Probleme selbst in die Hand zu nehmen. Ein Waisenkind zu unterrichten, bedeutet, einen wachen jungen Geist mit den notwendigen Mitteln versehen, um anderen, weiteren Waisen zu helfen. Von einem unterrichteten Kind profitieren zehn andere!


Über Interhelp:


"Auch die besuchten Projekte "Hilfe für Paraliya" (Schulbau, Unterstützung eines Krankenhauses, Ausrüstung von Fischern), die durch "Interhelp - Deutsche Gesellschaft für internationale Hilfe" durchgeführt werden, haben beeindruckende Erfolge erzielt. Auch hier gilt, dass mittels persönlicher Kontakte eine vertrauensvolle Organisation möglich ist, die zudem von Deutschland aus professionell gefördert wird."



Undine Kurth MdB, Bericht für den Ausschuss für wirtschaftliche Zusammenarbeit und Entwicklung



"Sie haben gezeigt, dass internationale Kontakte nicht nur Regierungssache sind, sondern ein Netz darstellen, das gerade in Notzeiten tragfähig ist."
"Das humanitäre Engagement der Interhelp- Mitglieder ist nicht nur Ausdruck eines guten und erfolgreichen bürgerschaftlichen Engagements, sondern auch Beleg dafür, dass aus Niedersachsen heraus nachhaltig und unabhängig von Schlagzeilen uneigennützige Hilfe für Opfer von Katastrophen geleistet wird."



Christian Wulff, Bundespräsident aD der Bundesrepublik Deutschland



"Was Interhelp macht, hat Hand und Fuß, ist seriös, nachhaltig und effektiv."



Hans-Heinrich Sander, niedersächsischer Minister für Umwelt



"Sie waren als erste vor Ort und sind immer noch da! Das verdient Lob und Anerkennung. Der Einsatz von Interhelp kann gar nicht genug gewürdigt werden. Wir Hamelner können stolz darauf sein, dass es in unserer Stadt Menschen gibt, die nicht gleichgültig gegenüber den Ereignissen und Katastrophen sind, die um uns herum geschehen und denen wir gemeinsam begegnen müssen."

Susanne Lippmann, Oberbürgermeisterin der Stadt Hameln



"Für diese Organisationen bin ich sehr gern als Bettler unterwegs."

Fürst Alexander zu Schaumburg-Lippe, Schirmherr von Interhelp



Interhelp- Deutsche Gesellschaft für internationale Hilfe ist ein gemeinnütziger und mildtätiger Verein, der aus der Aktion „Hameln-Pyrmont hilft!“ hervorgegangen ist. Am 4. Januar 2005, also wenige Tage nach der verheerenden Tsunami-Katastrophe in Süd-Asien, hatte sich die Hilfsaktion in Hameln bei Hannover gegründet. Getragen wurde sie seinerzeit von der Deister- und Weserzeitung in Hameln und vom Paritätischen Wohlfahrtsverband Hameln, der Mitglied ist im Aktionsbündnis "Deutschland hilft". Interhelp ist die Nachfolgeorganisation von „Hameln-Pyrmont hilft!“. Schirmherr der Deutschen Gesellschaft für internationale Hilfe ist Alexander Fürst zu Schaumburg Lippe.

Am 08. Januar 2005 startete von Hameln aus ein Erkundungsteam nach Sri Lanka. Unter der Leitung des Journalisten und Kinder-in-Not-Gründers Ulrich Behmann wurde auf Sri Lanka die Küstenregion des Distrikts Galle erkundet, um nach geeigneten Gebieten für eine Soforthilfe und für eine längerfristig angelegte Hilfe zur Selbsthilfe zu suchen.


In Paraliya bei Hikkaduwa, wo der Express-Zug Nr. 50 von den Gleisen gespült wurde, wo mehr als 2500 Menschen den Tod fanden und ein Dorf ausradiert wurde, wurde die Aktion "Hameln-Pyrmont hilft" vom Katastrophenstab des Divisional Secretariat gebeten, ein Feldlazarett zu errichten. In einem notdürftig hergerichteten Schulgebäude wurden vom 12. Januar 2005 bis zum 15. März 2005 Opfer der Flut behandelt und mit Medikamenten versorgt - unter der Leitung von Reinhold Klostermann, Unternehmer, Lehrrettungsassistent und stellvertretender Vorsitzender der Deutschen Gesellschaft für internationale Hilfe (Interhelp) führte ein internationales Helfer-Team in dieser Zeit 18.500 Behandlungen durch. Kooperationspartner war das Balapitiya Base Hospital.

Mr. Amarasiri Kuruwage, Staatssekretär des Justizministers Amarasiri Dodangoda, bat "Hameln-Pyrmont hilft!" um Zelte und Betten. Flut-Flüchtlinge, die ihre Häuser wieder aufbauen wollten, sollten in der Nähe von Hab und Gut übernachten können. Die medizinische Versorgung wurde im In- und Ausland gelobt und begrüßt - unter anderem von der deutschen Entwicklungshilfeministerin Heidemarie Wieczorek-Zeul, die unsere Projekte besucht hat.

Mit einer Geldspende des Rotary Clubs Bad Pyrmont wurden in den ersten Tagen mehr als 6 Tonnen Reis und Zwiebeln an Rückkehrer verteilt, die die Hamelner Aktion in Sri Lanka gekauft hatte. Überhaupt wurde vor Ort eingekauft. Nur Medikamente, die es auf Sri Lanka nicht zu kaufen gab, und Zelte wurden mit freundlicher Unterstützung der Fluggesellschaft "Emirates" eingeflogen.

Das "Hameln Hospital" wurde am 15. März 2005 an die "Sri Lanka Red Cross Society" übergeben. Somit ist das Rote Kreuz künftig in der Lage bei kleineren Katastrophen selbst einzugreifen.





Run for (your) Life 2016




Am 9. Juni 2016 werden sich die ehemalige Interhelp-Schirmherrin und jetzige Bulgari-Markenbotschafterin Prinzessin Lilly zu Sayn-Wittgenstein-Berleburg und ihr Sohn Erbprinz Donatus zu Schaumburg-Lippe auf eine einzigartige Reise begeben.



Mit der Unterstützung sowohl von Interhelp als auch von Bulgari wird sie ihr Projekt zu den emotionalen Wurzeln von Lillys früheren Jahren mit der Organisation in Bulgarien zurückführen, wo sie über einen Zeitraum von 5 Tagen einen fast 200 km langen Ultra-Marathon bewältigen wollen.


Das Projekt spiegelt die Hoffnung wieder, die dem Wesen der karitativen Organisation zugrunde liegt: Die Hoffnung, die Strecke zu bewältigen symbolisiert zugleich die Hoffnung auf eine bessere Zukunft in den ärmsten Ländern der Welt - in diesem Fall auch in dem wirtschaftlich schwächsten Land der Europäischen Union, Bulgarien.



Bis zum heutigen Tag hilft Interhelp Waisen im ganzen Land und trägt wesentlich zur groß angelegten Hilfsprojekten bei.



Lilly und Donatus werden ihren Instagram-Account täglich aktualisieren, und Sie können ihnen live auf Runtastic folgen, um sie anzufeuern und zu motivieren! :

Nehmen Sie teil am Kampf gegen die Armut!

Jeden Tag sterben Kinder auf den Philippinen aufgrund von krimineller Gewalt und Armut. Sie können mithelfen, dem ein Ende zu bereiten, indem Sie uns helfen, unseren Plan umzusetzen. Spenden und Promotion-Aktionen ermöglichen es, diesen Kindern aktiv zu helfen, und es ist nur einen Mausklick entfernt!

Stellen Sie sich eine Welt vor, in der Sie Betroffenen die Fähigkeit verleihen können, einander zu helfen.



6 Möglichkeiten, wie Sie helfen können:

1. Spenden sie und gewinnen sie tolle Preise! - Jede Spende hilft und dient ausschließlich dem Projekt, sie wird nirgendwo anders verwendet. Mit Ihrer Spende können wir die Voraussetzung für eine funktionierende Infrastruktur finanzieren - und zugleich winken Ihnen großartige Preise.

2. Teilen und gewinnen - Gewinnen Sie ein exklusives Mittagessen mit dem Interhelp-Schirmherren Fürst Alexander zu Schaumburg-Lippe und seinen Sohn Erbprinz Donatus, außerdem zwei kostenlose Eintrittskarten zu dem renommierten Adventsmarkt “Weihnachtszauber Schloss Bückeburg”.

3. Werden Sie Botschafter - Jede Form von Aktion oder Hilfe unterstützt das Projekt, Schritt für Schritt, und wir laden Autoren oder Entwickler ein, Web-Inhalte zu erstellen, die unsere Botschaft verbreiten können!

4. Zeigen Sie Enthusiasmus - Zeigen Sie, dass sie unser Projekt verstehen und unterstützen sie Lilly und Donatus bei Ihrer Herausforderung, indem Sie den Hashtag #runforlife verbreiten.

5. Geben Sie uns Feedback - Helfen kann auch bedeuten, uns zu zeigen, wie wir unsere Botschaft noch besser kommunizieren können. Wir hören sehr gern von Ihnen und freuen uns über jede Form von moralischer Unterstützung.

6. Werden Sie Mitglied - Interhelp heißt immer und gerne neue Mitglieder willkommen. Durch ihre Mitgliedschaft zeigen sie Ihren Glauben an den gemeinsame Zweck, der Katastrophenhilfe und Armutsbekämpfung. Jedes Mitglied von Interhelp schenkt den Ärmsten der Armen die Chance auf eine bessere Zukunft. Häufig gestellte Fragen

Wofür benötigen Sie $ 140.000,-?
Nach ausführlichen Untersuchungen zur Frage, wie wir die zugleich nachhaltigste und kostengünstigste Umgebung für “unsere” Kinder herstellen können, sind wir zu dem Schluss gekommen, dass dies der Sockelbetrag ist, mit dem wir unser Vorhaben einleiten können. Grundlegende Erfordernisse wie Waschräume und Toiletten, Unterbringung für Mitarbeiter, Wasser- und Stromversorgung, aber auch die nötigen Werkzeuge, um dies alles zu errichten, summieren sich zu 140 000 US-Dollar.

Natürlich werden in Zukunft weitere Mittel benötigt werden, da diese Dinge nur die ersten Schritte darstellen, aber damit schaffen wir die Basis, den Eckstein für die Umsetzung unserer Vision.
IL PROGETTO YOUTH VILLAGE
ISPIRARE UN BAMBINO, ISPIRARE UNA NAZIONE!

Ci sono oltre 2 milioni di
bambini senza casa soltanto nelle Filippine, e siamo in procinto
di cambiare la situazione. Ma abbiamo bisogno del vostro aiuto!
Dal Typhoon Haiyan nel 2013 le Filippine
hanno subito conseguenze inimmaginabili alle loro infrastrutture, e ci sono
voluti alcuni ottimisti per trovare una soluzione.
La costruzione di muri ed edifici e la
fornitura di istruzione ai bambini nelle vicinanze della città di Davao hanno
contribuito enormemente al lento progresso di ricostruzione dei paesi, ma
questo non è sufficiente!
In una collaborazione unica tra
visionari filippini e tedeschi il Davao Youth Village mira
a cambiare le vite dei bambini attraverso la costruzione di un collegio per
orfani stabile, progressista e sostenibile.
Grazie agli sforzi congiunti di
centinaia di volontari questi bambini impareranno a costruire e creare, ma
anche a leggere, scrivere, e perseguire qualunque sogno accademico così che un
giorno anche loro potranno aiutare i loro compagni.
Oltre 8.000 persone
sono morte nel Typhoon Haiyan o nei
successivi negli ultimi 3 anni . I risultati sono
disastrosi, e le famiglie distrutte sono una mera realtà nelle attuali
circostanze.
Migliaia di bambini restano senza speranza e poveri in uno dei più
promettenti paesi in via di sviluppo al mondo, ma con l’elevata densità
demografica/esplosione demografica(?) e le ricorrenti catastrofi naturali è un
lavoro che richiede supporto.
Crimine, stupro,
droga.
All'ordine del giorno nelle più
importanti città del paese, con tassi di aumento allarmanti dopo ogni disastro
naturale. Uno dei paesi più belli del mondo sta combattendo per riprendere
il controllo, e con i numeri che scendono quelli che soffrono di più sono i
bambini rimasti orfani.
Può sembrare difficile, ma abbiamo un piano...

Come salvare un paese, un passo alla volta :
Il Davao Youth Village permette
ai bambini di prosperare in un ambiente positivo e sostenibile, insieme agli
insegnanti e volontari provenienti da tutto il territorio e dal resto del
mondo; questo rifugio sicuro permette alle persone di riprendere l'iniziativa,
finanziando l'istruzione, e migliorando le condizioni socio-economiche. Un
semplice passo alla volta:
Fase 1: Creare
infrastrutture di base, edifici, alloggiamenti, recinzioni, acqua, elettricità
e strutture didattiche.
Fase 2: Costruire
partnership (partenariati) con insegnanti e mentori, che agiscono come un
sostituto per i genitori perduti.
Fase 3: Fornire
strutture per l'insegnamento, i libri, attrezzature e dare il via al processo!
Fase 4: Guarda come l'iniziativa si
diffonde; i bambini diventano i docenti
L'istruzione è potere!
Potere di prendere in mano la situazione. Con
ogni orfano istruito si riempie una giovane mente brillante con gli strumenti
necessari per salvare il prossimo. Con un bambino istruito, dieci ne
beneficeranno!

A proposito di
Interhelp:
"Interhelp ha dimostrato che un’organizzazione
affidabile è possibile attraverso i contatti personali, e, per di più, quando è
ufficialmente supportata dalla Repubblica Federale di Germania ."
Undine Kurth MP , relazione
per la commissione per la cooperazione economica e lo sviluppo
" Avete dimostrato che i contatti
internazionali non sono solo questioni governative, ma rappresentano anche una
rete di sicurezza, in grado di raccogliere (persone) in situazioni di
emergenza .
L’impegno umanitario dei membri Interhelp
non è solo l'espressione di un ottimo e riuscito impegno da parte dei
cittadini, ma anche la prova che la Bassa Sassonia offra aiuto disinteressato
alle vittime di catastrofi, in modo sostenibile e indipendentemente
dai titoli""
Christian Wulff ,
ex Presidente della Repubblica Federale di Germania.
"Quello che fa Interhelp ha
senso! E’ rispettabile, sostenibile ed efficace . ""
Hans-Heinrich Sander , Ministro per l'Ambiente della Bassa Sassonia
" Essi meritano la nostra lode
e il nostro rispetto. Le attività di Interhelp non possono essere
apprezzate abbastanza, e possiamo essere orgogliosi del fatto che ci siano
persone nella nostra città che non sono indifferenti agli eventi e catastrofi
che accadono intorno a noi, che dobbiamo affrontare insieme .
"
Susanne Lippmann , Sindaco del Comune di Hameln
"Mi piace molto viaggiare come un
mendicante per conto di questa organizzazione."
Il principe Alexander di
Schaumburg-Lippe , Patrono della Interhelp
Interhelp - Società Tedesca
per l'aiuto internazionale è
un'organizzazione umanitaria non-profit, filantropica e indipendente. Aprendo
la strada a iniziative lungimiranti sostiene le popolazioni che si trovano in
situazioni di emergenza in tutto il mondo, in particolare a seguito di gravi catastrofi
naturali, come terremoti e inondazioni.
I membri della Interhelp lavorano su
base volontaria. Al fine di aiutare rapidamente, in modo efficace e
sostenibile, Interhelp dipende interamente dalle donazioni a livello nazionale
e dall'estero.
Ingaggiato dallo Stato della Bassa
Sassonia (Repubblica Federale di Germania), la sua Task Force Medica è in grado
di fornire assistenza medica in tutto il mondo entro 24 ore. Dopo la
catastrofe dello tsunami in Asia meridionale, Interhelp è stata la prima
organizzazione per gli aiuti all’estero con il permesso ufficiale di iniziare i
lavori di ri-costruzione dello Sri Lanka, questo ha stabilito un rapporto
duraturo e significativo che resta attuale.
Il patrono di Interhelp è il principe Alexander di Schaumburg-Lippe .
Correre per
salvarsi la vita
Il 9 giugno 2016 l'ex patrono Interhelp e ambasciatore del marchio Bulgari
la Principessa Lilly zu Sayn-Wittgenstein-Berleburg e suo
figlio principe Donatus di Schaumburg-Lippe si imbarcheranno
in un viaggio unico.
Con il patrocinio di Interhelp e Bulgari il loro
progetto li porta alle radici sentimentali dei primi giorni di Lilly con
l'organizzazione in Bulgaria , dove condurrano un’ultra
maratona di circa 200 km su un percorso di 6 giorni .
Il progetto simboleggia la speranza
coinvolta nella beneficenza, sia che si tratti della speranza di sopravvivere alla
corsa, o la speranza di un futuro migliore nei paesi più poveri del mondo, in
questo caso la nazione economicamente più instabile della UE.
Ad oggi Interhelp aiuta gli orfani in tutto il
paese e contribuisce in modo significativo a progetti di soccorso su larga
scala.

Domande e risposte
Perché avete bisogno di $ 140.000?
Dopo una ricerca approfondita su come
meglio possiamo stabilire il contesto più sostenibile ed allo stesso tempo più
economico per i nostri bambini abbiamo definito che questo è il costo di base
stimato per iniziare a costruire. Le esigenze infrastrutturali di base,
quali servizi igienici, alloggi del personale, fornitura di acqua, energia elettrica,
si sommano agli strumenti necessari per costruire tutto questo, generando tale importo.
Naturalmente in futuro saranno necessari
più fondi, poichè questi sono soli i primi passi verso la costruzione di una
nuova casa per gli orfani delle Filippine, ma getta le fondamente che saranno
la pietra angolare per realizzare il nostro sogno e la nostra ambizione.
Come facciamo a sapere che avrà
successo?
Come con tutti gli altri progetti
Interhelp, il finanziamento sostenuto da noi e dai nostri sponsor ci ha dato determinazione
necessaria per completare tutti i nostri progetti senza eccezioni. Lodi da
parte dei membri dello stato ovunque sia in Germania che nei paesi in cui
abbiamo operato hanno dimostrato che la fondamentale padronanza e organizzazione
utilizzate nella nostra struttura dei compiti è sostenibile ed efficace.
E così, come per qualsiasi altro
progetto, abbiamo lavorato insieme con professionisti esperti per determinare
le probabilità di successo del progetto Youth Village. Le tempistiche, le
risorse e il tipo di corsi sono stati presi in considerazione, per determinare
quante sono le probabilità del progetto di Jon Perez di apportare un
cambiamento effettivo al contesto locale. Siamo giunti alla conclusione
che è di fatto possibile, e molto probabile, ma che avremmo avuto bisogno di
una mano da parte di terzi, qui è dove entri in scena tu!
E' interamente una questione di se
possiamo, insieme, raggiungere l'importo necessario per determinare l'efficacia
del nostro progetto. Il resto riguarda le mani esperte di Interhelp e
l'incredibile etica del lavoro visionario dei Filippini.
Da dove posso donare?
Ovunque.
Devo pagare spese di spedizione
supplementari per i miei vantaggi?
Niente affatto.
Qual è il modo migliore per sostenervi?
Non esitate a consultare quanto
sopra! Eventuali autori e / o gli sviluppatori, ecc sono invitati a
divulgare materiale collegato a questa campagna, ma è possibile utilizzare anche
semplici hashtag #runforlife o #interhelp. Qualunque piccolo azione aiuta!
Naturalmente non potremmo essere più emozionati se decideste di fare di più,
non esitate a contattare il Sig Ulrich Behmann, Presidente di Interhelp al ubehmann@aol.com
Quanto delle donazioni va al progetto?
Meno le spese per i benefici accessori, tutto quanto ,
senza alcuna eccezione.

story:
Hello everyone. My name is Darrell Miho and I am a Director for the American Society of Hiroshima-Nagasaki A-Bomb Survivors (ASA) in Southern California and in charge of documenting the stories of hibakusha (atomic bomb survivors).

We (ASA) have embarked on a project to document stories from hibakusha from around the world. Many stories have been documented in Japan, but very few interviews of hibakusha outside of Japan have been recorded.

We have met with over 400 hibakusha in the USA, Japan, Brazil, Canada, South Korea and Taiwan and have over 100 survivors who said they would like to tell their stories on camera. To this date, no one has attempted to interview this many hibakusha outside of Japan. It is a monumental task, but with your help, we can document and share their stories with you and the rest of the world.

Time is of the essence.

The average age of hibakusha is over 82 years old. Recently, our president and co-counder, Kaz Suyeishi passed away. We are grateful for her leadership and her passion for telling her story to teach the world about the power of love, not war. It is in her memory and the memories of all hibakusha that we continue to document their stories. 

Even more recently, Sumiteru Taniguchi (pictured above and in the video link below), another hibakusha and peace advocate, passed away on August 30 after a long battle with cancer. He was 88. Fortunately, we had the opportunity to interview him and Suyeishi-san before they passed away.

"As someone who has died and come back to life more than once, I feel that I have to tell as many people as possible about the joys of life and the hatred I felt during my time of suffering. I'll keep on fighting until all nuclear weapons are banished from this earth. To everyone who is listening, I beg you to think of yourselves as parents building a bright future for your descendants." ~ Sumiteru Taniguchi

We must continue to share their stories. With each hibakusha's passing, we lose their personal stories about those horrific events in Hiroshima and Nagasaki 72 years ago. It is vital that we document their stories while they are still with us so that we can continue to share their experience with future generations. We can not forget what happened 72 years ago. We can not forget how nuclear weapons affect people's lives.

Today, tension between North Korea and the United States is growing more intense. NK continues to conduct underground nuclear tests and missile launches while the US has sent military reinforcements to the region to defend it's allies and take part in annual military drills. Meanwhile, the leaders of both countries continue to exchange verbal threats that jeopardize world peace. 

We are hoping to raise $100,000 to carry out the remainder of the 100+ interviews. Money raised will go toward production and travel costs to conduct interviews in the six countries mentioned above and the post-production costs of translating, editing and creating short videos to promote peace and a world free of nuclear weapons.

Here is a link to a compilation of some of the interviews we have already completed.

https://vimeo.com/219052892

The ultimate goals of this project are three-fold.

1. Document the stories of survivors while they are still with us. The average age of hibakusha is now over 82 years old. Unfortunately, they will not be with us forever, so time is now of the essence.

2. Create a multi-media exhibit of still photos and videos that will travel around the world and online. Most people have seen pictures of the mushroom cloud, but very few know what happened to the people who survived. Our goal is to educate people on how nuclear weapons affect people’s lives.

3. Create a book using the portraits of the survivors and excerpts from their testimonies. The book will be sent to world leaders around the world, to remind them of how nuclear weapons affect people’s lives and to urge them to embrace peace and the abolition of all nuclear weapons.

Thank you for your interest in supporting our project. Together, we can make this world a better place. Peace begins with us.

Darrell Miho

Director, American Society of Hiroshima-Nagasaki A-Bomb Survivors

story:
Short Summary

“English through Drama” is a British company created to enable children from all ethnic backgrounds, worldwide to learn the English language. We are an ex BBC drama producer, a National Theatre actress, experienced teachers, business people and web designers. Our 56 courses for kindergarten, elementary and secondary schools have been workshopped and have developed our successful methods of teaching. Our courses contain many plays to perform, songs and games, as well as conventional language teaching.

English through drama offers a two pronged approach: firstly directly to teachers and secondly we offer a parents' pack of complementary courses. English through drama encourages the whole family to participate and learn. This stimulates ease of communication between generations and builds bridges of understanding. We are also passionate to support poor and talented children with scholarships and other benefits; and to encourage their imaginations, creativity, confidence and team work, while having fun learning English.

Your valuable support enables the teaching of entire schools the English language for free. The community as a whole benefits by coming together and being involved in plays and all manner of creative arts.

What We Need & What You Get

Our objective is to make our teaching programmes available to every school in every country. The internet makes this possible. Most schools have the resources to achieve this, but many do not. Your financial help sponsors schools in areas of great hardship, enabling children to improve their chances of a better life, through education and knowledge of the English language.

Any contribution helps us help them. $100.00 covers a school for a whole year. For those sponsoring a school we will keep you updated with the name and location of the school and whenever possible sending update emails to you. Many schools are in remote, poorly serviced areas making communication unreliable; but we will endeavour to add their achievements to our website and post performance alongside other children’s efforts worldwide.

We have no limit great or small. Every $100.00 opens the door to another school. There are thousands of worthy schools from the mountains of Nepal to the dry scrubland of the African bush. Please support these communities to learn the English language and enable worldwide communication through the wonderful language called…. ENGLISH.

The Impact

www.englishthroughdrama.com can be viewed today. We have 56 teaching courses for children from 3 to 18. It offers a host of support tools:

1. Translations (some) and explanations in the parents' and teachers' native languages.

2. Scripts for plays – including a fun to perform free play with an important message: The Birds Who Flew Beyond Time (see http://www.englishthroughdrama.com/the-birds-wh...)

3. Videoed teacher demonstrations.

4. Help with music and sound effects.

5. Warm up games and songs.

6. Help with pronunciation (phonics ).

7. Tips for props, scenery, costume and performance

8. Help with researching the background to plays.

9. Encouragement to create flashcards.

10. Learning from teaching peers.

The website is continually work in progress. We need more translation, filming of teaching demos and new content. We will add a performance platform to post performances worldwide. We seek sponsorship from individuals and large corporations to create life changing scholarships and challenging competitions. Your support enables us to help the children and offer a better service to teachers and parents by upgrading our website.

This is a tremendous undertaking. Join us and spread the word… English of course.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot contribute yourself, please spread the word for this worthy cause.

  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
The Vision

Members of the International Churches of Christ (ICOC) community travel all around the world for many reasons. Often times a barrier to traveling is the high cost of overnight accommodations.

Members attempt to find other members in sister churches around the world to coordinate overnight housing. They desire to connect with other Christians for mutual encouragement and to save a few dollars along the way. This pursuit can be challenging when:  

  • They don't know anyone personally where they are going
  • Members they knew in the city have since moved away 
  • They feel awkward contacting local ministry leaders listed on the church's website to see if a host can be found
  • The list can go on and on...

The very fiber of the ICOC community is love, relationships, and hospitality. For years, disciples in the church have demonstrated their love by hosting others as an expression of Christian faith. They have seen a need and answered the call, with open doors and open hearts.  They have freely shared with others out of what has been given to them.  

The vision for Come & Stay came to Founder Cheryl Parker as a result of the joy she gained from hosting sisters in her home in Virginia when she lived there. Conversely when she traveled, she often felt insecure when seeking housing for herself. And frustration when trying to help other disciples in her ministry connect when they traveled.  

It is from that place that the concept for Come & Stay was born...a platform to simplify connections between hosts and travelers within the ICOC community. A solution to help make travel more accessible, coordination seamless and goodness shared

Come & Stay: A Global Platform

Come & Stay will be built exclusively for the International Churches of Christ community. Through member profiles, house listings and a messaging system, the site will enable Travelers to connect with potential Hosts for short-term overnight stays known as  "Hospitality Exchanges". 

HOST membership will be completely FREE! Hosts will create a member profile and listing for their home to share about their household, what they have to offer, and expectations of their guests. Hosts will be able to respond to Traveler inquiries through the Come & Stay messaging system.  A Host Rewards Program will be designed where Hosts can earn points for successful stays coordinated through Come & Stay which can be redeemed for great perks!

TRAVELER membership will be around $129 annually. Travelers can create a member profile and will have access to Host listings. Travelers will be able to initiate communication with potential Hosts through the Come & Stay messaging system.  

Traveler members will also have the capability to exchange their entire home with other Traveler members if they so choose, for "Home Exchanges". Home Exchanges are a great way to go on vacations and mission trips around the world on a limited budget!

Will it be safe?

Come & Stay is rooted in trust, sharing and caring. A verification process will be done between Come & Stay and local churches to ensure members belong to a local International Church of Christ community. As an extra layer of protection, the platform will have built-in verification tools. By creating a detailed listing, a member profile and writing reviews, members become active participants in ensuring transparency on the platform.  

Help us build it!

With your support, a whole new world will open up to members of the ICOC community. 

Sixty percent (60%) of the fundraising goal will be used to build the platform and ensure it's safety. Preliminary discussions have been had with web developers who anticipate the platform taking 3 to 4 months to build and test. The site will be user-friendly and visually appealing, allowing users to add photos, preferences and even reviews.  

Thirty percent (30%) of the funding goal will be used to build awareness and educate the ICOC community around the world on the concept of the platform. There will also be a push to attract members who desire to add their homes on the site as a Host.  

Ten percent (10%) of the funding goal will be used for customer support as the site is being tested for launch.

Funding received in excess of the goal will be used to accelerate our marketing efforts internationally, enabling more and more disciples to join so we have more places to go. 

With your help, we will be able to launch in early 2017. Come & Stay will change the way disciples travel! 

The Impact

Travel touches all of our lives. Think of the reasons you travel:

  • Leisure and adventure
  • Educational and career pursuits 
  • Medical appointments and legal proceedings 
  • Relationship seeking and relationship building 
  • Missionary efforts and disaster relief 
  • Moving away and moving back 'home' 

Church members all around the world are like extended family. Local ministries will be enriched by the connections it's members will be able to make through Come & Stay. 

  • Relationships will be built that will last for eternity
  • Families and individuals will discover and explore new places
  • And ultimately, more needs will be met as we are called to "share with the Lord’s people who are in need"

Ways You Can Help

  • Choose one of our amazing perks and contribute TODAY!
  • Like us on Facebook @comeandstay and Follow us on Twitter @comeandstayicoc 
  • Share Come & Stay with your local congregation and disciples you know around the world  
  • Provide your email address so we can stay in touch
  • And pray for our efforts!

The Team

This initiative is being spearheaded by members of the Austin Christian Church. 

Brandon Knicely, Jaemin Lee, Vivian Igunbor, Cheryl Parker, Audrey Vivar, Christian Ray

story:
Note: Subscription Perks are equivalent to the number of months you will receive unlimited rentals :).


Thank you to our initial funders!! We're at $429!! Here's to sharing knowledge the old school way!!

We've launched our Facebook page! Head over and check it out. Don't forget to like (Stats & Recs Facebook page :)).

Follow @knob_technologies on Instagram! Rapid growth since Founder announced website on July 15, 2016!


Updated Website!!!!! Visit www.knob-technologies.com!!!!! KNOB Technologies could really use the funding to grow our book collection!! The more books the more customers we can serve!!!!! Help spread KNOwledge through KNOB Technologies Knowledge Boxes!!! Every dollar or social network share is appreciated!!!!! We're so excited for this adventure!!!!!



Innovation happens when knowledgeable minds collaborate. What will you add to the world?


Our Current Mission:
Deliver knowledge in a box so our users can apply their skills to the next out of box solutions! Despite the different resources online we find that it's always nice to have a hardcopy reference book on hand. With KNOBs you can receive unlimited reference books throughout the month. Use the book as long as you want and drop it in the mail when you want a new book. Flat fee of $50 per month.

The purpose of KNOB is to assist those who want to sharpen their current skills in statistics, data science, computer programming, data visualization, or a personalized subject area.

 When each subscriber signs up, a KNOB representative will ask pointed questions to determine their current level of expertise, career or academic goals, and goal timespan. 

Each month, Lauren will personally curate themed boxes for different levels of expertise. The books and exercises in the box will be recommended by Lauren, her former and current colleagues, peers, and former professors. Lauren will also do the final vetting.  Upon checkout the customer can choose if they want a different title. KNOB welcomes different titles because it helps to grow our library and our user's libraray as well.

Many people are trying to earn a job in the tech industry, and KNOB Technologies believes this box can help individuals achieve their desired level of success and anything else they dream to achieve.

Near Future Missions. Thank you Google for teaching me to set big goals.:
Acquire an impressive stock of technical resource books.
Employ individuals to scale appropriately. 
Employ other individuals who have a passion for honing their craft while paying it forward through helping out in the KNOB curation process.
About the Founder/CTO:
http://laurenwashington.me

Lauren is a lover of acquiring knowledge and subscription boxes!

Nicknames: Giggles, Elledubby

Throughout life, she has always been the go to friend/ colleague when someone wants advice on books or courses to hone their skills.

Payments Risk Strategist, Trust & Safety, Google, 2014- 2016

Statistical Analyst, Nielsen, 2012-2014

Big Data Intern and Graduate Research Assistant II, National Opinion Research Center @ University of Chicago, 2012

MA, QMSS (Applied Statistical Methods), Columbia University, 2012

BA, Economics, Spelman College, 2010

Lauren previously offered Intro to Data Mining and Data Visualization in R courses at Google. 

She has given 1 session of Intro to Data Mining in Mountain View, CA in order to prepare her colleagues for a talk she arranged on Data Visualization in R. 

This talk was given by her former professor and world-renowned statistician Andrew Gelman. 

She also taught a Graphs in R course as a follow-up to Andrew's talk and a 2nd part after colleagues requested a follow-up. Lauren also provided a condensed version of Graphs in R to Hyderabad, India counterparts.

KNOB Technologies

KNOB Technologies was started by an individual who believes the sharing of resources and networks is the key to success in life, academia, and any professional career. 

Investing in Lauren's passion is equivalent to investing in innovation. The more people who gain access to these resources, the more they can advance and enhance their own lives and careers. 
What KNOB Technologies Needs & What You Get
  • Lauren is requesting $150,000 to build the current customer base and book reserves available. 
  • The funds will go to a monthly spot in weWork offices in San Francisco (and hot spots offered through their service), Investments will also go towards funding the proper licenses needed for certain software in statistics (e.g STATA, SAS) and data visualization tools (e.g. Plotly professional subscription). Lauren will also use the funds to start scaling her subscription box service and purchase courses for her own personal career advancement in statistics, programming, and data visualization.
  • If the goal isn't reached the funds will still go to the listed items above.

The Impact

  • Investing in KNOB is investing in the faith you have in Lauren's knowledge and GRIT.
  • KNOB Technologies and Lauren have so many ideas and wants to hire other individuals who share the same passion. It's fun to work for large companies to help them change the world. However, this doesn't provide creative individuals their own platform to change the world with their own brilliant ideas! KNOB Technologies strives to promote innovation.

Risks & Challenges

There's always a chance the goal won't be reached.

  • Lauren will keep building KNOB Technologies and its ventures. Why? Because she has always had a passion for knowledge sharing. She's just asking for others to invest in her passion.
  • Other professionals will be stuck in career and knowledge gain ruts.
  • Other Ways You Can Help

It's okay if you can't help through funding:

  • Share the word through the Indiegogo tools!
  • Contact KNOB Technologies for a sticker pack!
  • Just help us get the word out and hope that the company remains highly favored!

And that's all there is to it. Thanks for your support!

 When each subscriber signs up, a KNOB representative will ask pointed questions to determine their current level of expertise, career or academic goals, and goal timespan. 
Each month, Lauren will personally curate themed boxes for different levels of expertise. The books and exercises in the box will be recommended by Lauren, her former and current colleagues, peers, and former professors. Lauren will also do the final vetting.  Upon checkout the customer can choose if they want a different title. KNOB welcomes different titles because it helps to grow our library and our user's libraray as well.
Many people are trying to earn a job in the tech industry, and KNOB Technologies believes this box can help individuals achieve their desired level of success and anything else they dream to achieve.

Near Future Missions. Thank you Google for teaching me to set big goals.:
Acquire an impressive stock of technical resource books.Employ individuals to scale appropriately. Employ other individuals who have a passion for honing their craft while paying it forward through helping out in the KNOB curation process.About the Founder/CTO:http://laurenwashington.me



Lauren is a lover of acquiring knowledge and subscription boxes!
Nicknames: Giggles, Elledubby
Throughout life, she has always been the go to friend/ colleague when someone wants advice on books or courses to hone their skills.
Payments Risk Strategist, Trust & Safety, Google, 2014- 2016
Statistical Analyst, Nielsen, 2012-2014
Big Data Intern and Graduate Research Assistant II, National Opinion Research Center @ University of Chicago, 2012
MA, QMSS (Applied Statistical Methods), Columbia University, 2012
BA, Economics, Spelman College, 2010
Lauren previously offered Intro to Data Mining and Data Visualization in R courses at Google. 
She has given 1 session of Intro to Data Mining in Mountain View, CA in order to prepare her colleagues for a talk she arranged on Data Visualization in R. 
This talk was given by her former professor and world-renowned statistician Andrew Gelman. 
She also taught a Graphs in R course as a follow-up to Andrew's talk and a 2nd part after colleagues requested a follow-up. Lauren also provided a condensed version of Graphs in R to Hyderabad, India counterparts.



KNOB Technologies

KNOB Technologies was started by an individual who believes the sharing of resources and networks is the key to success in life, academia, and any professional career. 



Investing in Lauren's passion is equivalent to investing in innovation. The more people who gain access to these resources, the more they can advance and enhance their own lives and careers. 
What KNOB Technologies Needs & What You Get


  Lauren is requesting $150,000 to build the current customer base and book reserves available.  The funds will go to a monthly spot in weWork offices in San Francisco (and hot spots offered through their service), Investments will also go towards funding the proper licenses needed for certain software in statistics (e.g STATA, SAS) and data visualization tools (e.g. Plotly professional subscription). Lauren will also use the funds to start scaling her subscription box service and purchase courses for her own personal career advancement in statistics, programming, and data visualization. If the goal isn't reached the funds will still go to the listed items above.    The Impact  Investing in KNOB is investing in the faith you have in Lauren's knowledge and GRIT. KNOB Technologies and Lauren have so many ideas and wants to hire other individuals who share the same passion. It's fun to work for large companies to help them change the world. However, this doesn't provide creative individuals their own platform to change the world with their own brilliant ideas! KNOB Technologies strives to promote innovation.    Risks & Challenges There's always a chance the goal won't be reached.

Lauren will keep building KNOB Technologies and its ventures. Why? Because she has always had a passion for knowledge sharing. She's just asking for others to invest in her passion.
Other professionals will be stuck in career and knowledge gain ruts.

Other Ways You Can Help


 It's okay if you can't help through funding:  Share the word through the Indiegogo tools!
Contact KNOB Technologies for a sticker pack!

Just help us get the word out and hope that the company remains highly favored!
   And that's all there is to it. Thanks for your support!

12/21/2016 - IMPORTANT UPDATE: The part II of this Campaign was launched here :  Click on this link to see the campaign - Part II

As the first campaign launched to save the Anglican St Lawrence College expired and, as we did not, unfortunately, reach the goal, the St Lawrence College's Team decided to launch this "Part II of the same campaign".

Thanks to everyone who contributed to our project in Round 1. Your contributions helped us to pave the way for a stable future for the College. 

The funds raised during the first campaign and the additional funds raised during this Round 2 campaign,  will be used to to stabilize the financial statements of the school .

Initial campaign goal : 30,000 USD

Funds Raised during the first campaign : 725 USD

Funds to raise for the campaign - Part II : 30 000 - 725 = 29,275 USD

Campaign - Part II deadline : 02/19/17

You can make a donation here : Click on this link to see the campaign - Part II

 

SAVE THE AMBOHIMANORO ANGLICAN ST LAWRENCE  COLLEGE (MADAGASCAR)

story:
Hello!

My name is Cindy Y. Shaw; I am a Graphic Designer and Illustrator from Ann Arbor, Michigan. I have a book series called #MrRedBooks. The first book was Mr. Red’s Balloon, and I am excited to announce the second book in the series through this campaign – King Cat’s Crown.

About #MrRedBooks

I created #MrRedBooks not only to help children learn the English language, but also to learn important life lessons through the stories and be exposed to art at a young age. Both art and reading are important factors in a child’s development.

Only about one third of American fourth-graders are proficient in reading. By fourth grade, if children can't read at grade level, they're unlikely to ever catch up.
(source)

This book series was inspired by a painting, and takes place in a colorful world. It focuses on Mr. Red and his friends learning lessons around town.

Mr. Red's Balloon Mr. Red is a cheerful blob man who goes through town trying to encourage his friends. They think he is happy because of his balloon, but he teaches them otherwise.

King Cat's Crown The second book in the colorful children's book series, #MrRedBooks. In this story, Mr. Red helps his good friend King Cat search for his missing crown.

Goals

Mr. Red always does his best to help his community so this campaign aims to do the same. This is where I need your help. For each book you purchase, one will be donated to Milk+Bookies. $500 brings 50 #MrRedBooks to you, and 50 #MrRedBooks to Milk+Bookies. The more copies you buy, the more copies we donate!

MILK+BOOKIES is a non-profit organization that exposes young children to how great it feels to give back while celebrating the love of a good book. They spread the love of reading to those who can’t afford books of their own. Learn more at www.milkandbookies.org

Perks

Thank you for contributing; any amount helps! All perks ship free to the US.

$5: You will receive one Mr. Red and King Cat Greeting card to send to a friend. You will also receive a Mr. Red Bookmark.

$10: One #MrRedBook for you, one for charity. We will send a survey asking for your book selection. You will also receive a Mr. Red Bookmark.

$20: Two #MrRedBooks for you, two for charity. We will send a survey asking for your book selection. You will also receive 2 Mr. Red Bookmarks.

$50: Five #MrRedBooks for you, Five for charity. We will send a survey asking for your book selection. Autographs are available for this perk level upon request. You will also receive 5 Mr. Red Bookmarks AND a limited edition art print!

The Impact

Twenty-six percent of children who were read to three or four times in the last week by a family member recognized all letters of the alphabet. This is compared to 14 percent of children who were read to less frequently.
Only 53 percent of children ages three to five were read to daily by a family member (1999). Children in families with incomes below the poverty line are less likely to be read to aloud everyday than are children in families with incomes at or above poverty.
(source)

Bringing books to children will help shape their futures; so help Mr. Red’s Balloon and King Cat’s Crown help children read!

Your interest in this campaign will also help me to create more #MrRedBooks to share with these young readers.

Other Ways to Help

Spread the word! Reviewing our books on Amazon and your websites will help create exposure for #MrRedBooks. Please share our campaign; every click counts!

Thank you for your support!

Cindy from Shaw Creative

www.cindyyshaw.com
www.shawcreativeinc.com
hello@shawcreativeinc.com
